choices: Get one of them to eat the purple peanut butter
Take a bite of the chocolate cake yourself to see if you grow big
Eat some purple peanut butter and go spying
Eat some cake topped with purple peanut butter, just to see what happens
Nothing for now, go downstairs and get to know your cousins better
1.content:
You can't believe it. You have to spend yet another summer with Aunt Fiona and Uncle Harvey. Last summer was nearly the death of you thanks to a little trip into the basement of your Aunt and Uncle's home. They told you not to go down there, that they avoided the basement because the last owner of their house had been slightly eccentric, but like any normal twelve-year-old you ignored them and went down anyway

Down in their basement you found loads of old furniture, stuff neither of them had bothered to get rid of in the three years they'd owned the house. You went down there to avoid your cousins, Barney and Dora, two of the worst human beings on the planet, at least to you. While down there you discovered an old fridge, like something out of the nineteen-fifties. You hadn't eaten anything that day except a bag of stale peanuts on the plane. Your stomach rumbling you opened the fridge

Inside were two food items you hadn't expected to find. One was an average thing that just looked to be out of place, the other was like nothing you'd ever seen before. The first was a piece of chocolate cake from a place called Effy's Bakery in a nearby town. Considering the layer of dust covering everything you were amazed that the cake still looks moist, despite the fact that it must have been sitting in that basement fridge for years.

The other item was something that looked like peanut butter, yet had a purple color to it. Placing your finger inside you found that this purple peanut butter was just like regular peanut butter in texture, though the smell was an odd mixture of aromas you couldn't place. Your stomach growling so loud your afraid your cousins will hear it and come down, you decided that one of these items will fill you belly.

A moment of indecision later you were sitting on a dusty armchair with the jar of purple goo in your hand. Cautiously you stuck you finger in again and brought out a large wad of the stuff. You sniffed it again just to make sure that it wasn't rotten or spoiled or something, and then you slowly stuck the tip of you tongue into the purple goo. To your utter amazement the stuff tasted awesome. Like a mixture of peanut butter, jelly, and chocolate. Quickly you scraped the jar clean with your finger, and found that you felt as if you'd eaten an entire meal.

The next twenty-four or so hours of your life sucked. After a brief run in with Dora in the basement you were forced to play dolls with her, and you got your first suspicions that something was wrong with you. That night at dinner you found the table seemed to be getting bigger as you were sitting in your seat, and you were finding dozens of other things in the house, especially the people, seemed to be growing too.

You went to bed that night hoping that you were hallucinating. That maybe this feeling that you were getting smaller was just a reaction of being near Barney, who, despite being only a year older than you, was almost twice your size. You slept fitfully, waking up twice in the night covered in sweat, but somehow you managed to keep yourself calm both times and get back to sleep. That morning you groggily got out of your bed, and then were startled when the bottom of you pajamas fell to the floor, you'd become so small that they didn't fit at all any more, none of your clothes did.

Except for the shirt and jeans you'd worn the day before. It didn't take your panic stricken mind to realize that something from the day before must have caused your size problems, though it took you over fifteen minutes to realize what it must have been. You'd been so worried about the feeling of shrinking that you'd forgotten all about the purple peanut butter you'd found in that strange fridge in the basement.

Like a cannonball out of a cannon you raced through the house to the basement door, and as you did so you noticed that it was almost ten in the morning, you'd slept much later than usual thanks to the bad night. Still you got to the basement in record time and threw the door open to find something that chilled you to you soul. The basement, which had been like a junk heap the day before, was empty today, and the fridge with the purple peanut butter jar was gone.

Your heart pounding you searched the house until you found your Aunt by the front door. You found out two things from her. One was that you should not trust Dora. Despite the fact that you'd played dolls with her she'd still tattled on you and told her mother that you were in the basement. The second, and far more import piece of information was that the fridge and supposedly the purple peanut butter were now at the local dump, having been picked up that morning by two of you aunt and uncle's friends.

Leaning down to kiss you on your head your aunt didn't notice that you were more than a foot shorter than you were when you'd arrived yesterday, and she rushed out he door and left to her job at a university nearby. You just stood there for a long while, staring at the door, it was when you realized that you could actually see the door knob getting higher as compared to your head that you sprang into action.

First you tried calling a doctor, but they were quick to decide that it was a prank call and the lady at the other end hung up on you. Your next action was to try and catch a bush to you aunt's university, which proved problematic, but you did it anyway. You were lucky that there were people getting off at the university themselves, because by the time the bus had arrived at that stop you were only about six inches tall, and still shrinking.

Once on campus you decided to try for something closer than the administration building across the way, the place where your aunt worked, and instead rushed to the scientific research building. Inside you were nearly killed for being a mouse, and then ended up in the lab of a Doctor Abbot, a nutty professor who's attempts to help you resulted in his own shrinking, and forced you to find a route back to your aunt and uncle's home.

After hitching a ride with a girl who lived next door you were again inside the home where your problems had started, and breathed a quick sigh of relief that Dora's cat had apparently run away for the day, or your one inch high body would have looked like a very yummy treat to her. Still you had to get someone to notice you, and then help you, and the only two available people were Dora and Barney. You were quick to decide to get Dora's attention, though ended up nearly getting squished under her shoe as she walked through the house.

You tried to get her attention by climbing onto a makeup pencil she was using, something from her mother's makeup kit that the eleven year old girl probably shouldn't have been touching. Unfortunately for you Dora panicked at the sight of you, and decided you were a bug without a second thought. Shaking you off her pencil, caused you to fall right into a nearby sink, and then washed you down the drain.

So it was that you found yourself in the sewers. This would have been the lowest point of an extremely low day, except for the fact that you found a ride in the form of a water beetle, and were soon soaring over the city, and in short order found the dump, and the fridge. With a kick you sent the beetle down towards the fridge, but it refused to land so you were forced to jump off its back and roll to a landing a ways away from your target.

After a brief run in with a lizard that was probably only a few inches long in which you almost got up close and personal with the food chain from the wrong side, you at last got to the fridge, which had luckily lost its front door. Looking up you saw that the upper shelf did not hold the jar of purple peanut butter anymore, but it did still hold the box of chocolate cake, and you had a small glimmer of hope that maybe the two items had been in the fridge together for a reason. Such as a poison and antidote thing.

Working your way up to the shelf you were disappointed to find the box empty of everything save a single crumb and a smear of icing, but you decided to try your theory anyway and quickly downed the last bits of cake. Feeling odd and disoriented you discovered that the cake box, which had been an enormous airplane hanger a moment ago, was now about the size of a house, and still shrinking. You were right. The cake had been the antidote to the purple peanut butter.

Once restored to your original height you made your way back to your aunt and uncle's house, and found Barney waiting to beat you up in the lawn. A brief confrontation left Barney with a sore wrist, and you staring at your own hands. You were faster and stronger than you'd ever been before, probably as a result of your adventure. You were also quite hungry as a result of your escapades and went inside to the fridge. Upon opening the door you got two more surprises.

The first you should have expected, after all you aunt is a bit of a pack rat and the chocolate cake still at least looked good. Siting on a plate in the back of the fridge it looked perfectly ordinary. The second was the jar of purple peanut butter, the same jar you'd licked clean the day before. You were sure it was empty when you left the basement, but when you pulled it out of your aunt's fridge, you found that the jar is almost twice as full as when you'd found it the day before.

Quickly, and stealthily you grabbed the two items. You didn't know why, but you just couldn't stand the thought of Barney or Dora figuring out what they do, so with a thief-like grace you snuck back up to the guest room you were sleeping in, and then hid the two things in your luggage. At the time it had seemed the right thing to do, though really you wouldn't have been able to keep them hidden for the rest of the summer.

Luckily your parents never got to Europe. Their business trip was canceled before they even got on their flight thanks to a hostile takeover, and they came for you as quick as they could, getting you away from Dora and Barney. One the long flight home your thoughts constantly went to the plastic wrapped cake and the strange unmarked jar stuffed among you clothes. Their power was under your control then, and is now as you pull back up to the house of your aunt and uncle.

Once again your parents are off to do business overseas, and you are again dumped on your closest relatives for the summer while they are away. Only this time you have two items that you have kept carefully hidden all year. Somewhere buried deep within your socks is a jar of purple peanut butter, and nearby is the piece of chocolate cake. As you lug the suitcase up the stairs to the guest room you can't help but smile. This is gonna be a fun summer.

Packing your clothes away in the dresser near your new bed you stare at the cake and jar. You have so many ideas as to what to do with them, yet you have to choose one. Somewhere below you hear the door close again as your aunt and uncle rush off to their jobs, having taken a little time off to get you at the airport. Down in the living room you can hear the TV blaring as Barney and Dora watch something loud and obnoxious, probably looking for tips on how to annoy you. Alone with those two, what do you do?
1.title: What has gone before

choices: Try to get Dora to eat some peanut butter too.
11.content:
Barney has been waiting to get revenge on you since last summer. It was obvious that he would be willing to do just about anything to get on your nerves. That gives you an idea about how to get him to eat some of the purple peanut butter.

You walk into the kitchen with the purple peanut butter and try to be loud enough so that Barney and Dora will know you are there. After you find some bread, jelly, and regular peanut butter you start to make a sandwich. You spread the regular peanut butter on the edges of a slice of bread and spread the purple peanut butter in the center of the same slice of bread. Then you spread the jelly on the other slice of bread and put the two slices of bread together, completing your peanut butter and jelly surprise sandwich.

You sit down and wait for the noise on the TV to die down. When it does you pretend to start eating the sandwich while having your back to the room where Barney and Dora are watching TV. You hear Barney come walking into the kitchen and snatch the sandwich out of your hands before you can take a bit, just as you expected. Due to the regular peanut butter concealing the purple version, Barney does not suspect a thing. “Thanks for the snack squirt,” he casually says to you while taking a bit out of the sandwich.

“Give it back,” you pretend to whine while making a half-hearted effort to get it back. He laughs at you while continuing to eat your little surprise. You really do not think that your acting is that good, but Barney was never really that smart. Barney was just the type of person that gained joy out of picking on people and you were saying what he wanted you to say while acting just like he would want you to act. Frankly, you think he acts like an eight year old bully and it will be funny when he really is the size of an eight year old.

You hear the TV start to blare up again. Barney throws the small portion of the sandwich that is left into the trash. “That was actually pretty good twerp. Now you can make one for yourself,” Barney says derisively as he walks back to continue watching TV. You chuckle to yourself. It will be nice to see what happens when his sister sees him shrinking. You will have to keep an eye on him too, even though you do not like him he has not done anything that means he deserves death. Depending on how small he gets, that might be a real possibility.
11.title: PB & J Surprise

111.content:
As Barney continues to watch TV, you watch him closely to see that he is indeed shrinking, but very slowly. You decide to go play basketball outside. About an hour later, you go back into the house to check on Barney. You see Dora who is as tall as Barney, laughing at him. As soon as he sees you he comes over to you.
"What did you put in that sandwich squirt!" he yells
"Me? Squirt?" you say, pushing him a little to show your superiority.
"That's not funny! Change me back!"
"Nah. I'm gonna enjoy this."

When you go back to your room there is a slight problem. The chocolate cake is missing!
111.title: Barney is shrinking

1111.content:
You run out of the room to see Dora with in the kitchen,with the cake!
"No!"you yell,as she stuffs the whole cake in her mouth,wich is impresisve considering the size of her mouth,and swallowing.
"This is great!"she says.Then...
1111.title: Dora took it.

choices: A “big” side-effect of overindulgence, and Dora lives up to her nickname...
Her stumble caused a “huge” mishap with the cake, and Dora blows up... and up...
11113.content:
“Mmm…!” Dora’s mouth was so full with the last bite of chocolate cake that a few precious crumbs were tumbling down her Hello Kitty! T-shirt and over the small slope of her stuffed stomach to land with other evidence of her thievery upon the lap of her white shorts, staining them with brown streaks as she picked at the bigger pieces and licked her fingers clean. Her lips were caked with splotches of chocolate frosting as she diligently went to work chewing her last mouthful before swallowing it down with her tummy visible swelling just the slightest bit. The cake was once a double-layered piece of chocolate perfection roughly twelve inches in diameter. Now, it was nothing but a pile of crumbs on an empty plate and on the not-so-empty stomach of an eleven-year old girl. Dora licked her lips clean of the frosting, using her fingers to swipe away the rest before she patted her tummy with a pleased smile.

“That was the best chocolate cake I’ve ever had! Thanks for saving it for me, Bug!”

That hated nickname flew right over your head because you could hardly believe your eyes. How on earth had she managed to eat the entire cake so quickly? No, better yet, why hadn’t she immediately started growing after the first bite just as you had last summer?

Her bare feet dangled off her chair, her toes lightly touching upon the straps of her mother’s sandals, which had likely fallen free from her feet before the start of her afternoon snack. Likely “borrowed” from her mother’s room, they were a pair of platforms that would give their wearer an extra four inches to their overall height. Sliding forward on her seat, Dora placed her feet back into her mother’s slip-ons and rose to her full stature, surprising you yet again.

Despite wearing her mother’s platform sandals and being only a year younger than you, Dora was still a half-a-head shorter than you. She started walking and she made all of two steps before she tripped and fell flat on her face, the sandals flying free from her feet and landing far and away from the girl whose feet were frankly still too small to keep their straps tight.

You winced, knowing what was to come.

Drippy Dora had nothing to do with a snotty nose or a salivating mouth. Dora earned the nickname, which was never spoken when she could hear it lest she live up to it, by the fact that she was a tremendous crybaby in every sense of the word. There they were now as she slowly sat upright with slightly skinned knees but otherwise none the worse for wear. She sniffled loudly, her eyes watering and open her mouth wide to unleash the first wave of wails—

Grumble…

You blinked and took a step back from your younger cousin. “What… was that?”

Dora appeared just as startled as you and her voice wavered as she spoke, “I-I th-think that wa-was…”

Gurgle…

It was Dora’s turn to blink with twin tears falling down her face as she looked down at the culprit, placing a hesitant hand upon it. “My tu-tummy…”

You took another step back wondering what that meant for Dora.
11113.title: Nothing happens... At first...

111131.content:
“Oh…!” Dora winced, wrapping both arms tightly around her middle.

Groan…

“M-My… tum—Eek!” She flinched with a startled gasp, tears falling down her eyes.

Gurgle…!

“My tummy…!” Dora tilts back her head, taking great gasps of air.

Too late do you realize what’s about to happen.

GROWL!

“My tummy HUUUUUUUUUUURTS!” The dam at long last was broken as Dora sat on the floor wailing loudly in pain as her stomach rumbled like thunder. You were at a loss. What could you do to try and help your little cousin when you had no idea what was causing this monstrous stomachache to begin with? The cake was supposed to make Dora grow just like it had you, maybe even give her some strangely subtle superpower too, but all that it seemed to have done was make her tummy tremble and shake like it was the epicenter of an earthquake. You took a step forward, hand outstretched to try and calm Dora down when you suddenly slipped and fell on your behind.

Dazed, and more than a little surprised, you shake your head and rub your sore bottom as you looked down at the cause of your stumble. A massive puddle of Dora’s tears was spreading out beneath your cousin as she wailed her agony to the heavens, her legs kicking out at the air. One of her bare feet launched itself at the leg of a nearby chair and sent it flying across the room and into the wall. You gaped at your cousin in shock. Had the cake somehow given her super strength and an endless supply of tears?

No… Your eyes narrowed. No, she was getting bigger! You couldn’t tell what with her lying down as she was but given that the tiles on the kitchen floor were each a foot wide… Doing some quick math you realized that Dora was…
111131.title: A “big” side-effect of overindulgence

choices: "W-what's happening to me" - growing panic and tears
"I-I'm growing? I gotta get outta here" - growing exit plan
1111312.content:
No… Your eyes narrowed. No, she was getting bigger! You couldn’t tell what with her lying down as she was but given that the tiles on the kitchen floor were each a foot wide… Doing some quick math you realized that Dora was over 6 feet tall.


In fact she was 9 FT Tall and growing as she wailed

At one point 1 of her long arms and growing hands reached for remaining plate of frosting and cake crumbs.

"I-it's not fair this cake was so good and I was hungry"
She wailed licking the remaining pile of crumbs and frosting clean away.


Just great as if Dora needed even an ounce more of cake and frosting!

The pain soon subsidies but there's a few new problems.
As the wailing girl grows you notice her clothing struggling to grow with her.
The other issue is Dora filling up the room.

Finally her crying is interrupted as she realizes something is happening to her.
1111312.title: Over six feet tall!

choices: Dora decides to terrorize her new tiny neighborhood.
Dora is a friendly giantess and wants to play games with her micro-sized world.
111132.content:
You stare at your cousin and can't believe what is happening. Her hands were rubbing her swelling tummy and she was too preoccupied with her pain to notice she was slowing expanding all over. "Uh Dora?" you try to say something as you see her tummy swell out more pushing her hello-kitty T-shirt up and exposing the hem of her white and chocolate streaked shorts. Dora continued to sob and complain about her stomach pains not aware that she was now over 7 feet tall sitting on the ground. Your eyes almost bug out of your head as you see her thighs swell and maker her shorts very tight, you can see her the outline of her underwear and her tummy continues to balloon slightly. Her chubby arms were getting longer and you could see her mid-drift very clearly.

Dora was weeping still and it seemed bizarre that she still had not noticed what was happening. When her torso filled the t-shirt she was wearing till it looked skin-tight She opened her eyes and realized her perspective was slowly shifting upward. "What is happening to me?" Dora said as she looked at her lengthening fingers. It didn't take more than a moment for her to realize. "I'm getting bigger?" She questioned as her now skin tight shorts began to make noises of strain. She could feel her round bottom being wedgied by her panties. Dora stood up now over 10 feet tall. The sudden shift made you feel a chill down your spine. You could see her smiling now and wiping away her tears as her round belly was eye level with you. "At this rate you really are going to be a bug!" she said as her shorts began to tear at the seams. Her flat chest began to fill and you could see the outline of her training bra and what clearly was her now swelling nipples. Dora felt the ceiling press against the top of her head. She did nothing to stop what came next as her head began to break through the ceiling. now almost face to face with her private area you couldn't help but see her white shorts keep ripping and were shocked to see waistband of her shorts give away. Her T-shirt was barely covering her chest and her swollen tummy stuck out some. She rubbed her belly and knew the cake was far from done with what it was doing to her. Her T-shirt began to rip at the seams and in a moment Dora was 13 feet tall. Her head had gone through the ceiling and Dora giggled as her shoulders continued to add to the size of the hole.

You had to look up now as she kept filling the room. Her white shorts had ripped away and she was standing in a pair of light green panties with little hello-kitty heads printed on. You begin to blush when you look past her round tummy and see she is filling out her light-pink training bra. Her roughly A cup breasts had budded from her swollen nipples and you couldn't help but see the outline forming against her light-green underwear. Dora raised her arms up and began to make the hole she had created larger. Her lower body was still in the kitchen but her head was pressed against the underside of the house's roof. She felt the sting of pain as her head thumped against the hard-wood of the roof.

"Oh!" Dora grunted and in a swift motion fell down on her butt. She had her legs in a V and you could see her underwear was growing with her. You were about 10 inches from her groin area and just stood shocked as her body continued to expand. Dora let out a loud wail and began to cry again not willing to ignore the thump on her head. "That really hurt!" She cries loudly and at her size the sound was near deafening. The windows in the kitchen began to crack from the power of Dora's voice. Dora was balling her eyes out yet again. Dora was over 20 feet tall you estimated and you could feel the warmth of her tears raining down on you. Her body was getting closer to you from your perspective as her long legs filled the kitchen and began to press against the walls. You could see dark marks on her underwear from her tears and were not sure what to do. She kept growing and crying the sound getting louder and louder as she expanded. You decided to escape while you could and left the house.

Dora's head and shoulders and broken through the roof with some strain. She was now rubbing the sore spot on the top of her head and still growing over 25 feet tall. You could see the roof was breaking away and the house was looking very damaged from the effects of Dora. She suddenly flung her right hand into the roof and let out a rage filled cry. "Stupid house! That really hurt!" She stood up over 30 feet tall. She kicked out and knocked over a whole wall, nearly ruining the whole house in the process. She lifted her left leg and stepped out into the yard.

You could see her ankles were eye level with you and when you looked up you were very worried, Dora looked angry and kicked the house again. The house was in ruins and Dora kept attacking her former home. She had punched and kicked at the hose till it was a pile of rubble. You were not sure if Barney was ok but hoped he had managed to get outside in time.

Dora put her hands on her waist and looked down proudly at her destruction. "Stupid house hurting my head." She said to herself and had seemed to calm down. Dora was over 40 feet tall and still showing no signs of stopping. You look past her very large feet and as your eyes travel up her once chubby now tree-like thick legs. From your angle you couldn't avoid seeing the outline of her crotch. The massive crease in underarea of her panties was alarming to you, it was gross to see something like that especially your cousin's cameltoe, the size and continuously expanding nature of her body made you realize she could be right about you looking like a bug now. You keep looking up and could see her now B cup breasts had overfilled her light-pink training bra which had dark pink spots all over it from her tantrum. You didn't know what to do as Dora looked down at the now tiny world before her. "I wonder if I am going to stop growing?" Dora asked herself now over 70 feet tall and still expanding. You were not sure what was going to happen next as she looked at her surroundings.
111132.title: up she grows

choices: Barney is nowhere to be seen.
112.content:
Since you have some time you decide to make yourself a real sandwich. It normally takes a little time for the shrinking process to begin. So, you have time before you have to start watching over Barney. When you are about halfway through your snack, you hear a scream of delight from Dora. You start to run into living room.

Dora is skipping to her room with a six inch tall Barney in one hand when you get there. Well, that happened a lot faster than you thought it would. Maybe that overactive pituitary gland of his has had an odd reaction to the purple peanut butter. Even though this is unexpected, it is a little amusing. He is pounding on his formerly little sisters hand and demanding that she let him go in an amusingly high pitched voice.

Barney is being handled a bit roughly by his sister, but he does not appear to be in any danger. You follow Dora and see what she is planning to do to him. It is hilarious to see Dora start to play dress up with him. The pink ballroom dress she forced him to wear was the best costume in your opinion. Barney is swearing bloody revenge on both you after he gets back to his normal size.

Since Barney is alright for now you decide to go finish your snack real quick. Barney was starting to put his real clothes back on while Dora prepared a tea set when you started walking away. You had not made it halfway to the kitchen when you heard Dora scream. When you run back to her room you cannot see Barney anywhere. You ask Dora where he is. “He bit me when I picked him up and I accidentally threw him out the window,” she said meekly while holding her hand. You look over to the window and notice that it is indeed open.

This is a disaster. Who knows what could happen to him out there. You rush out the front door and pray that Barney is still alive. If he is dead you have no idea how you will explain this to his mother. You may have wanted him to get a little humiliated, but now you are feeling really bad about creating this situation.
112.title: Big Brother No More

1121.content:
You rush around the house and to the window that Barney would have been thrown from. There are a few bushes in the area that he could have landed in. He could have landed in the grass too which is why you are careful to watch your step as you near where he could have landed.

There is no sign of him at first. You are fairly certain he is not in the grass since you would have noticed a six inch tall teenager by now. The foliage on the bushes is so thick that you would have trouble spotting a person of Barney’s size. Then you hear a faint high pitched moan. You look in the direction of the noise, but still cannot see anything. Just as you were about to mark the noise off as something you had imagined, you hear Barney’s voice again. It sounds like he is yelling at something and that makes him easier to find.

When you find him there is a strange scene being played out. An overly curious squirrel has taken an interest in Barney and he is trying to get it to back off. Barney’s protests do not seem to affect the squirrel in the least since it is at least twice as tall as he is. The squirrel takes a quick look at you and does not seem the least bit bothered by your presence, people in the area must be feeding it and it is used to human presence.

You reach for Barney to rescue him from his furry assailant. When your hand is halfway to him Barney starts to shrink once again. You had thought that the shrinking process had stopped at six inches. Your own shrinking had been a pretty constant thing. This looks like a case of a drug affecting different people in different ways. He is decreasing in size much more rapidly than you did. It only takes a couple of seconds for him to shrink to an inch in size. This appears to have interested the squirrel even more in Barney since it picks him up and starts to run away with him.

“Come back here,” you yell at the squirrel. It pays no attention to you and darts up a tree, jumps onto a power line near the tree, and soon darts out of your vision. Looks like Barney is about to go on an adventure similar to the one you had on your previous summer vacation. He will have to depend on his wits, intelligence, and cunning if he wants to survive. That means you won’t see him again unless you do something about it.

Maybe you should go into the house and get some of the cake before you go looking for him. That way you could try to reverse this situation the moment you find him. Then again, the squirrel could be getting further and further from you as time goes on.
1121.title: Found And Lost, Again

11211.content:
It would be best to go get some of the cake first. You want to undo this unwise prank as fast as you can. The cake is still in your room and you rush to go get it. You are running out of the house when there is a crunch beneath your foot and you slip on something. Whatever you stepped on causes you to fall flat on your back. Then you remember that you have left the purple peanut butter in the kitchen.

You are afraid to look at what, or who, you have stepped on. When all you see is a doll, you breathed a sigh of relief. It would be a good idea to get that dangerous substance out of Dora’s reach though. Unfortunately, the jar of purple peanut butter is empty when you get to it. “Dora,” you call out. “Dora, answer me,” you call out again with rising panic in your voice as she does not respond. Great, this situation is spiraling out of control. You have two shrunken cousins you must find now.

Barney is in more danger right now so you should find him first. You make your way out of the house while looking for any signs of Dora on the way out. Failing to do so, you head in the direction the squirrel took Barney.

It does not take nearly as long to find him as you thought it would. You hear a dog barking and growling at something right next door. When you see what the dog is barking at, there you find Barney trapped in a corner. You would have to guess the squirrel had a run in with the dog and abandoned its captive in its own attempts to escape what is a fairly large Golden Retriever. If that dog has been living next to Barney, he has probably been tormenting the animal whenever he can get the chance. You had best go rescue him before the dog should decide to do something irreversible to him.

You are a little nervous to be approaching the angered dog. However, when you get close to it the dog calms down and acts as friendly as can be towards you. That confirms your thoughts about how Barney has been treating the dog. You pet it to show you are friendly and get it to leave Barney alone. Barney is yelling something at you, but his voice is way too high pitched for you to easily understand.

You reach into your pocket and pull out the piece of cake you brought from the house. That is probably not the best way to carry a cake around, but you will have some crumbs around if you need them. You hold out your hand and tell Barney he needs to eat the cake.

112111.content: Barney takes the cake. He...
112111.title: taking the cake

1121111.content:
Barney grabbed the entire cake from you and ate it! With that much cake, Barney would surely grow to a colossal size!

1121111.title: Really Big Barney

choices: He shrinks to your size again

As you look out the window, you can see giant sneakers filling up the driveway. You grab the peanut butter and go back outside. You quickly climb on to Barney's expanding shoes and up his gigantic leg. You climb up his growing body and finally reach his huge mouth. You throw the entire jar of peanut butter in. The shrinking started immediately.

He eats enough to make him his original size again. At first, nothing happened. He must be growing very slowly. You decide to put him in you pocket and play video games. A few minutes later, he was big enough to take out of your pocket. Ten minutes later, he was reaching the 3 ft point. You decide not to make fun of him because of the fact that he's returning to his original size. Finally, he stopped an inch shorter than you.
"Hehe..." you say to him.
"Thanks a lot..."

"Dora..."
1121112.title: normal

You try to open Barney's door, but it won't budge.
"Hey Barney, you in there?" you ask
"...yeah" he says.
"Did you take my cake?"
"W..what cake?"
"Oh no..."

You can tell that he ate the cake already.
All of a sudden, the door burst open, revealing Barney's gigantic foot. You look inside to see Barney crouching in his own room. he was about 20ft tall. If he stood up, he could destroy the house.
112111221.title: Big Barney

choices: The growth stops, and he does not see you
He is still growing, and he sees you
1121112211.content:
"How did this happen?" he asks you in a much louder voice than you are used to. He seems very scared of the present situation. "Uh-oh, I think I'm gonna grow again!" he yells out to you.

His foot, which was already filling up the doorway, was now trying to make more room to grow as the wood splinters and breaks and the door falls from the broken hinges. You could hear Barneys body pressing against all sides of the room, making the walls creak.

You quickly run outside for your own safety if the house happens to collapse, grabbing Dora on the way. You watch helplessly as Barney's massive head breaks through the back wall of the house. Both arms push out of opposite sides of the house, helplessly waving in the air. Finally, his legs burst out of the front side of the house.

And Barney was still growing. Soon enough, the roof collapsed from the damaged walls, and Barney's chest could be seen as well as the rest of his body. Slowly, you watch him get up out of the wreakage at a height of 40 feet tall.
1121112211.title: He grows even more

choices: Sneak into the rubble and pretend to be trapped
11211122111.content:
As Barney stood up from the wreckage of the house, he brushed the debris that had clung to him off stiffly which showed how shocked he was to suddenly destroy his own house with his size. Thinking quickly, you dragged Dora behind a thick tree to avoid being seen by Barney since you weren't exactly sure what would happen if he saw you two at his current size. Said giant was now looking around for you two, his face showing some worry since he wasn't sure if you and Dora escaped the house before it collapsed.

"Dora? Squirt? Where did you guys go? Are you guys okay?" Barney called out nervously as his gigantic hands began to dig through the rubble of the house. You and Dora remained quiet from your hiding place since you still didn't ant to take any chances and Dora was still frozen in shock of what had just occurred.

Upon receiving no answer, Barney's pace of digging through the rubble increased frantically out of fear that he had killed his siblings from his rampant growth. "No, no, NO! You guys can't be dead! Please!" Barney started shouting, guilt and worry beginning to make him panic. You were taken aback by the fear Barney was showing about you and Dora's fate, surprised that he actually cared for both of you.

Do you come out of your hiding place and show yourselves to Barney or sneak into the rubble and pretend you were trapped beneath all of it?
11211122111.title: Wow... he actually cares.

choices: Take the risk and get on his bad side
11211122112.content:
And yet Barney is still growing after all this time. But the worst is yet to come. You try to run out of sight but there is nowhere to hide, and Barney catches a glimpse of you.
"Wow, you look so tiny!" he said to you, his voice booming through the area. He walks over you, the ground shaking with each step. He stops just so you are directly face to face with his slowly expanding toes. You were about as tall as his ankle, but they won't stay that size for long.
Barney crouches over you, bending his gigantic legs.
"Whatever you did to me shrimp, its awesome! Maybe you're not so stupid after all." he says with a grin.
"How about we go for a ride?" he asks, holding his hand out in front of you. You hesitate. Barney starts to get agitated.
"You wouldn't want to get on my bad side, would you?"
11211122112.title: He is still growing, and he sees you

"No!" you say. "Fine by me." Barney says.

You climb up onto his now growing hand, and you look down from it, trying not to fall off. Barney is tall, but still gettin' taller!

"Where shall we go?" asked Barney.
112111221121.title: good side

choices: Barney puts you down and jumps in
You go with Barney into the lake.
1121112211211.content:
"to the Lake!" you say. "Very well!" Barney said. He held you tight in his expanding hand. You look at the ground from Barney's expanding hand. You start to feel worried. If he gets any bigger and you get even higher, one small slip could send you tumbling to your death!!!!!

Soon Barney is running toward the lake, his bare feet making booms on the road and in the fields which sound like thunder and an earthquake combined!! And getting even louder still!

Soon you see the lake. Thankfully Barney wasn't wearing any clothes!
1121112211211.title: to the Lake!

choices: ...but the purple peanut butter is better!" (sneaky sneaky)

You remember you have half of the cake hidden in your room still.
"I don't have any more. You took all of it...

...I ate the rest!" you say. You have an idea.

"Sometimes it take a while for the effects to jump in. And there's a little something you should know."
"What is it?" Barney was never the brightest type.
"The longer it takes for the effects to kick in, the bigger the outcome; if you know what I mean..."
"Oh. Sorry for taking the cake earlier, I had no idea."
This was going to be fun.
1121112221.title: Hehehe...

11211122212.content: "That's all right." you say. Barney looked puzzled, but shrugged. "Wanna go somewhere?" I asked suddenly. "Where?" asked Barney. You say, "How about....

choices: Barney slowly begins to grow bigger.

"...the lake!"
"Good idea!" Barney said. He looked down at his undies. "I'd better get changed, first." You wait whilst Barney gets changed.

A few miutes later, Barney was dressed... sorta. His clothes looked slightly too small for him.
his shirt looked stretched, his trousers wouldn't fit on his legs, and his shoes looked like they would burst.

"Let's go!" Barney said.
112111222121.title: "...the lake!"

choices: You realize Barney is still growing.
1121112221212.content:
You smiled as you looked at Barney; usually your annoying cousin, he was acting kinda nice... was that because he was grateful for you making him big? Or was he scared of you because of what you said? Either way, you were in control. Plus, he looked so funny with his miniscule clothes on!

"I'm ready, big guy," I said, sighing. "lemme just get my bathing suit..."

Barney tapped his large foot, slightly shaking the ground. "Fine... Just HURRY up!"

As I left the room, though, me and him coudn't help but hear an audible, slow tear. I turned around, looking at Barney, only to see him looking down at his feet. His toes had burst out the front of his shoes!

"Crap... well, they were too tight anyways." Barney muttered, ripping off his shoes like tissue paper as he wiggled his big toes.

You grinned. "Yeahhhhh, they are around like... 7 sizes too small now."

Barney smirked at he straightened up, cracking his knuckles and stretching, ripping his shirt slightly in the process. You watched as he ran out the room, ducking and running to the front door. His massive feet barely fit on the stairs! His feet... were they that big... earlier?
1121112221212.title: Barney slowly begins to grow bigger.

11211122212122.content: 'Eh, it's nothing.' you think to yourself, as you get your bathing suit. He can't possibly be growing bigger... can he?

You and Barney were soon at the lake. Barney changed into his somewhat extremely tight bathing suit. Barney decided to jump in first. and he did.

Suddenly...

1121112222.content: Barney is not the smartest you think, but he shouldn't trust you after the first time you tricked him. Barney looks at you and asks, "Will it make me grow like the cake?" you smile and tell him it might add 6 more feet. Barney can't wait for this and willingly follows you. You go to your room and open your dresser with the clothes from your last adventure. Luckily you hidd a case of peanut butter in it. You pull it out and make Barney a sandwhich. He doesn't wait for you to give it to him and snatches it from you and takes a whole bite. He finshes it off becuse he is so excited about growing 6 more feet. You suggest that he take a nap after everything that has happened. Barney punches you in the arm and says, "Good night dweeb."

You make sure that Barney goes to sleep in his bed. Then you slip off to find Dora. You walk into her room and look around. You see her cat laying down next to the doll house. You shou the cat away and look in the doll house. It is empty except her doll family. You put the roof back on top and push the house into a corner. Her room has clothes littering the floor like a jungle.

Then as you give up hope you hear a sound under the bed. You look under but all you see is a pink-frilled sock and an empty Cheez-It box. You throw the sock into one of the piles next to you and grab the box. You hear a rustle inside the box. Looking at the exoeration date you guess it could be a rat or bug but curiousity only killed the cat. Right.

You open the box and dump the remains on the pink cushined bed. After you shake it twice your 6 inch cousin Dora falls out. She is terrified now that shes the victim of the peanut butter. You pick her up realizing how frighted she is. Ifshe ran away you would never find her in the clothes. You find a cage that says "Princess" on it and stuff Dora in it. You remember Princess was Dora's hampster from 5 years ago.
