You pick up the cage and go into Barney's room.You go to the bed and sure enough Barney is back to 6 inches tall as well. He is still a sleep though so before you wake him up you put some of his shrits on the bottom of the hard seel cage. Then you replace Dora and put Barney in. You lock the cage pleased with your master revenge.

As you walk to your room you swing the cage back and forth. No one could rain on your parade. Then you hear a noise that makes you heart sink. The creak of the back door. You throw the cage under the bed and run to great your Aunt. As you run down you realize your problem though.
112111222211.title: Trapped Like Rats

1121112222111.content:
As much as you would like to tell her the truth you can't. You walk down causally and sit on the chair at the table. "Where is Barney and Dora?", your Aunt questions. "They went to there friends house for the night" you say calmly, "That's nice I didn't know they had friends." You grimace at this sad fact making you feel bad for the Rats.

You smile sheepishly as you eat dinner and go upstairs. You close and lock your door and run to the bed and pull out the cage. You open a side hatch for food and put in a small piece of steak from dinner. Next you take out the drinking bottle, fill it with water and return it to them. They slowly eat the food and drink the water.

You put them on the nightstand and act like your asleep. After an hour you walk over to the cage and pull Barney out. You carefully put him on the dresser still asleep. You turn and pull out Dora and in a mocking tone say, "Let's play Dolls"
1121112222111.title: Friendless Freaks

11211122221112.content:
"We'll play house first, and the first part of the house we'll go to is the pool" you say slyly. You carry Dora in your fist to your bathroom, where you unceremoniously drop her in the toilet. She swims around trying to climb up the sloped walls. When she gets near the edge, you unzip and take a wizz all over her and push her back into the water and cackle loudly. "Enjoying the swim, Dora?" You pull your 1 inch Dora out of the toilet soaked and carry her back into your room and drop her inside one of your smelly unwashed soccer socks and tie the end of it.

You begin walking over to the dresser and hear a *crunch* come from below as you feel something flatten beneath your foot. You look down and lift up your feet to see that you accidently crushed your cousin Barney, who is now stuck to the bottom of your shoe.
11211122221112.title: Play House

choices: Convince Dora to change her mind.
Dora refuses to give up the location.
112112.content:
Before Barney has a chance to reach the cake, the dog licks the cake right out of your hand. You stare open mouthed at the dog. It just licks your face in thanks for the treat. Eating just a crumb sized portion was enough to return you to your normal size when you were the size of a bug. That dog had just eaten a palm sized piece of cake. You hope that the cake is just an antidote for the purple peanut butter, but as you concentrate on the dog you can see it growing at a very slow pace.

You remember Barney if still there and reach into your pocket to try to find some of the cake crumbs. There are a few crumbs stuck to your fingers when you pull your hand out of your pocket. You brush the crumbs off in front of Barney and tell him to eat. The dog tries to lick up the crumbs, but you are ready for it this time and restrain it from doing so.

After you see Barney eat a crumb you pick him up. The Golden Retriever finally notices Barney again and begins to growl at him once more. You put Barney in the pocket that had not been holding the cake for safe keeping. If Barney ate more pieces of cake and became a giant that would probably be even worse than the dog growing into a giant.

You coax the dog into coming with you to your aunt’s house. If you can get the dog some peanut butter in time you should be able to avoid an awkward situation. You walk inside with the dog and go to the kitchen where you had once again left the purple peanut butter. Then you look on the kitchen table and see the object of your search is not there. What could have happened to it you think.

“It’s about time you came looking for me. Huh, you brought Max over,” a Dora that was six inches shorter than she should be said to you as she ran over to the dog, Max. When they are standing right next to each other it make the growth and shrinking process a little easier to see.

“Dora, why didn’t you answer me when I called for you and where is the peanut butter that was on the table,” you ask her.

“If I had answered you it would have been too easy to find me. Oh yeah, I am not going to tell you where the magic peanut butter is. It refills on its own and you would just keep it for yourself if you found it,” Dora giggles as she plays with Max and answers your questions at the same time. That is kind of true. You have kept the peanut butter to yourself and you definitely would not give it to Dora.

You will have to find a way to get Dora to reveal the location of the peanut butter. The dog looks like it is growing at the same rate you shrank last summer. If things go on like this, that dog will be monstrously tall by tomorrow night. Max may be friendly now, but he is still just an animal. Even if he decided not to eat anyone he would be able to do a lot of harm just by being a careless animal.
112112.title: Hide And Seek

choices: There is another surprise when you wake.
Things are as you expect when you wake.
1121122.content:
Try as you might, you cannot get Dora to reveal the location that she has hidden the purple peanut butter. She just giggles that annoying giggle and says, “You’ll never find it.”

The only good thing that is happening is that you feel Barney starting to grow in your pocket. At least he should be back to normal soon. It should also be pretty easy to reverse the effects on Dora too. One crumb of cake dropped in her food should take care of her. But there is the matter of what you will do with the dog if you cannot find the peanut butter real quick. It will only be a matter of time before the neighbors wonder where their dog is. You will also have to make sure the cake is well hidden now. It would be bad if Barney figured out that the cake could make him grow into a giant and then try to experiment.

When Barney is large enough to peek out of your pocket he starts yelling gibberish at you. He hides in your pocket again when Max starts growling at him. You decide to lock him in his own room. That will make it so you do not have to deal with him again until he is tall enough to unlock his own door and keep him safe from Max. Then you make a snack for Dora and place a single cake crumb in it. Dora is happy that you made her a snack and quickly eats it. The ungrateful little girl still won’t tell you where the purple peanut butter is though.

You spend most of the day searching all over the house for the peanut butter but have no luck. Your aunt comes home and is surprised to see Max in the house. “Nephew, how did you know we were supposed to be taking care of the neighbor’s dog while they are on vacation?”

Well, that explains why the neighbors have not noticed that their dog is gone yet. You just mutter an incoherent response to your aunt and keep searching. Before you know it your uncle has come home as well and it is time for dinner. Barney and Dora have returned to their normal heights by now, but Max is a good foot taller than he should be. Barney is much quieter than he normally is. He is probably wondering if he has gone insane after today’s experience. Nobody seems to pay attention to the fact that Max is taller than they remember.

You continue searching after dinner until it is time to go to sleep. Max has taken a liking to you and sleeps in your room tonight. You drift off to sleep and hope you will be able to totally resolve this situation before Max gets too big for you to handle.
1121122.title: Two Birds Down

11211221.content:
A ray of sunshine striking your face causes you to stir. You yawn and look out the window. By the position of the sun, it looks like you have overslept. Your aunt and uncle have already left for work by now. Taking one look at Max, you are glad he slept next to the bed instead of on it. He is slumbering quietly, but he looks large enough for you to ride him. You decide to let sleeping dogs lie.

There is only one thing you can do and that is find that purple peanut butter before the dog gets much larger. Your search eventually takes you into the living room where Barney is waiting for you, all 9 feet of him. He does not look too happy with you at the moment.

“You know cousin. I’ve been doing some thinking. All that weird stuff yesterday didn’t start happening until I ate that sandwich you gave me yesterday,” Barney said and you did not think it would be a good idea to mention that he was the one who stole the sandwich. He continued talking while you started edging out of the living room. “You also seemed to know how to reverse what had happened to me awfully easy. Now, you have turned me into some type of freak. And don’t think I forgot about what you did to me last summer. You have made a mistake this time though. You should have kept me small because now I am going to pound you into oblivion squirt.”

At that, you started racing out of the room with Barney in hot pursuit. His long legs let him easily catch up to you and he tackled you to the ground. It felt like getting hit by a sack of bricks. Barney had you pinned down and was laughing as he raised a fist to begin your pounding. You do not know if Barney realizes what the size difference between you means. If he were to put all the effort he could into hitting you he very well may end up killing you.

Suddenly, a terrifyingly loud growl comes from up the hallway. Max has woken up and has gotten even larger since you last saw him. He would have to be eye level with a large horse and is only a foot or two shorter than Barney. Barney does not take more than a second to figure out he needs to run from the large dog. He makes a hasty retreat out of the house and as Max is about to pursue you try to block his path. What Barney was about to do to you was making you seriously rethink whether or not he deserved to be mauled by a dog, but it would still take to much effort to explain the situation to your aunt.

You hope the dog will stop because there is simply no way you can make him stop. To your good fortune, Max likes you more than he hates Barney. He stops when you request him to and simply looks at you like he is wondering how you became so small. You pet Max under his chin and tell him what a good dog he is just to stay on his good side. It would probably be a good idea to get Max outside before he destroys the house. His growth seems to have picked up speed and you wonder why. As you are walking him outside you can see why, the place you had hidden the cake has been broken into recently and the cake is gone. Looks like Max was hungry when he woke up. It complicates the situation, but Max probably saved your life just now and you can live with that.

Then you remember Dora. Where has she been during all this commotion? The solution hits you like lightning. What else would a kid with magic chocolate flavored peanut butter be doing right now? You run back into the house and search for Dora.
11211221.title: Round 1: Max

choices: Barney’s growth has kept up with Max’s.
Barney is much smaller than Max.
112112211.content:
You rush back into the house and head to Dora’s room. Max looks a little excited by your sudden activity and tries to follow you back inside but he can no longer fit through the door. He whines a little as you leave him behind but you pay him no mind as you search for Dora. You burst into her room and see the jar of purple peanut butter sitting in the middle of the floor.

The jar is empty and by a few purple stains in the room you can tell this is not the first time the jar has been emptied today. You carefully walk into the room and search for Dora. Then you spot what looks like an ant sitting next to the jar. After a closer inspection you can see that the ant is actually Dora. You have the decency to not try to crush her like she tried to do to you last summer. She looks to small to handle without causing her harm so you leave her on the floor while taking the empty jar of peanut butter. It would take her hours to get out of the room, so she should be safe on the floor for now.

Now you are left with two problems. You need the cake and the purple peanut butter to reverse the affects on your cousins and Max. Both of them will take a little while to reappear and you need both of them fast. You check to see if any crumbs of the cake are left but it looks like Max has licked up every last crumb.

Not knowing what to do you go outside to keep an eye on Max. He has gotten a lot larger since you went inside. The dog could look into the second story of a house. You hope Barney has not gotten much larger given his bad attitude. Then you start to wonder why no one has called the police yet since there is a two story tall dog and a giant teen running around. Think of that conversation with the police. “Uhm, police. There is a giant dog in my neighbor’s yard” or “I saw a giant teen running down the street.” They would sure believe that. That should give you some time before the police get enough calls that they send someone out to investigate.

You were so lost in thought that you did not notice Max walking up to you until he licked your entire body. He may still be a lovable dog, but being covered in dog drool is not very pleasant. You try to think of something you could do with Max. It would be a good idea to find Barney. There is no telling what he will do with his new found power and Max would make for a good body guard.

You convince Max to lie down so you can climb onto his head. When you are on you tell him to find Barney and hope that he understands what he is supposed to do. Max starts walking down the street while sniffing the ground while growing larger and larger with each passing moment. It should only be a little longer before the police finally show up. Then Barney finally comes into sight.
112112211.title: Empty

choices: You find a way to grow
You find a way to get him to eat the PB
1121122111.content:
Slowly, Barney's enormous size comes into view, and you realize that his growth has indeed kept up with Max's. He was now truly a giant at an estimated 25 feet.
"Well, well, well!" Barney exclaims in a much louder voice than you're used to. "If it isn't my shrimp cousin and his big bad guard dog." He stopped in front of Max at your eye level. He appeared slightly taller than Max. Looking down you see his giant feet are half the size of yourself. He definitely had the power to stomp on you. You need to be careful on how you handle this situation. Even now, you can see his body is still getting bigger. What's worse, his growth process seems actually faster than Max's.

Smiling, he reaches out to grab you, but Max barks at him, quite loudly, giving him and yourself a jolt. As long as Max was as big as Barney, he couldn't get at you.

"Barney, you have to listen to me. Even now you are still growing bigger and if I don't help you it's gonna get out of control!" You yell out to Barney, but he just laughs in response. He couldn't take you seriously anymore at his size. You need a plan.

You thought of two possible solutions. Fight fire with fire, that is, find a way to grow to Barney's size and stop this by force. Maybe the cake refilled itself in the fridge in the basement?

Or, you could find a way to get Barney close enough and get some purple peanut butter in his mouth. But how?

You had to decide...
1121122111.title: Barney’s growth has kept up with Max’s.

choices: Barney is saved by a growth spurt.
1121122112.content:
Barney has grown a few more feet since you last saw him, but Max has grown much faster. He is standing next to a police car with his back turned to you. The 13 foot tall Barney looks like he has captured the police officer the car belongs to and is forcing him to give a false report to the station. Barney may be doing you a little favor, if the officer reports that all the calls that have been coming in really are just a bad prank, then you will have much more time to fix all your problems than you thought you would.

You are surprised Barney cannot hear Max approaching. Max has grown to the size of large whale and is still growing. It does not take Max long to recognize Barney. Using Max as a body guard is starting to look like a bad idea. When Max has his typical reaction to Barney, he and the officer whirl around to look at the angry dog. The officer faints at the sight of the dog and Barney takes off running.

Before you even have the chance to tell Max to stop, he starts pursuing Barney. A few of your fears are realized as the two giants tear through the neighborhood. Barney is running through fences like they are not even there. Max is doing even more damage. A crushed car here, the side of a house knocked down there. Maybe you can claim a small tornado tore through town. Fortunately, it is a nice day and most of the people who are not working are out doing other things so no one is hurt.

Max is gaining ground on Barney very fast. You are having a hard time staying on Max as he runs through town. There comes a point when you wish the dog would hurry up and catch Barney so you will not have to worry about falling to your death. Then it finally happens. Barney trips and Max pins him to the ground with a paw before he can get back up.

The situation looks bad. Max is bearing his teeth at the helpless Barney and it does not look like you will be able to stop the dog this time around. You give it your best shot anyways. Pleading, you ask Max to leave your cousin alone. He does not even respond to your presence. Barney’s fate is about to be determined by a dog he has tormented for far too long.
1121122112.title: Furry Tornado

11211221121.content:
Barney is starting to have one of those abnormal growth spurts. This growth spurt is very well timed to save his life. He is growing fast and he starts to laugh with joy as Max backs away in fear from him. You are glad he is going to survive, but you do not want to have a giant malevolent cousin running around. Then you look to your side and see that the jar of purple peanut butter has refilled itself while you were not looking.

You grab a handful of the peanut butter and lob it into Barney’s laughing mouth. The peanut butter is right on target and Barney’s growth stops almost immediately. You also take the opportunity to throw some of the peanut butter into Max’s mouth while he is panting. That will take care of two problems in a little while. Max is shrinking faster than he grew and Barney’s growth spurt turns into a shrinking spurt.

Even though Barney is still smaller than Max the dog remains wary of him due to that last growth spurt. You stay close to Max until Barney returns to his normal size. After he returns to normal, you try to coax a still elephant sized Max to come home with you. Barney is shouting a few threats to get back at you, but he makes no move to get any closer to you and Max.

You eventually make it home and you hope nobody has caught any of today’s events on camera. Max has shrunken to about twice his normal size by the time you home. He does not look like he is shrinking anymore and you get out a little more peanut butter to feed to him. That is when Max decides to be a little playful and tackles you to the ground. The hand that had the peanut butter on it wound up in your mouth and you accidentally swallowed the tasty substance.

Great, now you are about to have another shrinking adventure if the cake has not shown up again. You race to where you left it and see that it is still gone. Max has followed you around; he probably thinks you are playing some type of game. If Barney gets back before the cake shows up again you could be in some real trouble. And you still need to give some of the cake to Dora before someone steps on her. All you can do is sit here and wait for the cake to reappear while Max sits faithfully by your side.
11211221121.title: Shrinking Things Down To Size

112112211212.content:
Helplessly you watched yourself start to shrink quite fast. Everything around you seemed like it was growing as you were once again shrunk to the size of a bug. Max seemed to have lost sight of you as you shrunk; he was still so big that he couldn't recognise things if they were small enough, like you. Eventually, he got bored and walked away. You make note to stay away from Max from now on; being that size, he could kill you just by licking you!

You decide to hide in the food cabinet in case Barney comes wandering around. The boxes of cereal were enormous compared to you. Just then Barney comes storming into the kitchen. You could tell that the peanut butter brought him back to his original size, but he was still a giant compared to you. You could see him pushing over things and looking under tables. He was looking for the cake allright. And if that happened, life would about to get a whole lot harder.

Barney left in frustration, probably to search other rooms in the house. You had to get to it before he does. But where would it be? Where is the one place that it could just appear? Just like that you figured it out; the fridge in the basement! Thats where you first encountered the cake! It could have transferred over to the fridge in order to refill itself. You step out of the cabinet into the tile flooring of the huge kitchen, and start your trek to the basement door. Everything looked so big, you just looked in awe at your surroundings on your way to the basement.

When you got to the door however, it was closed. But no problem! You're tiny now! You crouch down and go under the bottom slit of the door. But now was the hard part: the stairs. Looking down, it seems like the basement is miles away. But you start your climb down each stair, using cracks in the wood to set your feet and keep you from falling.

After twenty minutes of descending the basement stairs, you finally reach the bottom, only to find that the fridge is closed, and there is no possible way to open it for a person of your size.

Just then, you hear someone coming down the basement stairs. You run and hide behind the fridge. You saw to your surprise that it was...
112112211212.title: You shrink quickly.

1121122112121.content: You winced as you saw that it was Barney coming down the stairs, still looking for the cake. Whats worse, his instinct for a missing cake led him straight to the fridge. You went around the fridge behind Barney to see what was inside. He opened the fridge, and saw...
1121122112121.title: Barney

11211221121211.content:
Since you were behind the fridge, you couldn't see what was inside. But by the look on Barney's face, you knew...
"Aha!" he exclaimed. "It's about time!" Barney reached in the fridge with a huge smile on his face, and drew out his hand, holding a full chocolate cake. It must have refilled itself in the fridge somehow.

By this time, you were busting with anger at Barney. But you were just a helpless, shrunken kid. You had to get to that cake somehow. Suddenly, you had an idea. As Barney turned to go back upstairs, you sprinted to Barney's giant shoe and grappled onto the back. You held on for dear life as he ascended the steps, each stride sending a shock through your body as the foot hit the ground.

As you were busy holding on, Barney was heading towards...
11211221121211.title: the cake!

choices: Barney goes indoors with the cake
112112211212111.content: Barney took the whole cake outside to the garden, then you leapt off his shoe and hid behind the table leg. Barney grabbed a knife he had got from the kitchen, cut off a slice and started to eat it. You were shocked. What was gonna happen?
112112211212111.title: outside

112112211212112.content:
Trying as hard as you can to see what is going on while holding on at the same time, you see Barney turn towards the stairs and to his room.
"This isn't good" you think to yourself. Barney jumps on the bed in an unnatural lively fashion. You have to act quickly before he eats the cake. Barney sits upright on the bed, gazing at the cake the entire time. He imagined the power he would have as a giant.

You jump off Barney's shoe and make for the bed sheets. You climb up the sheets, careful not to be noticed, and reach the top of the bed. As you do so, you see Barney pick up a piece of the cake.
"Oh, I hope this works as well as last time!" he says as he holds the piece up to his mouth.

Acting quickly, you run across the bed as fast as you can and make a leap of faith towards the cake right in front of a thoroughly surprised Barney. Almost in slow motion, you come in contact with the soft pastry (about as big as you) and are sent plummeting towards the ground. In the last split second before impact, you grab the cake and use it as a cushion for your landing. Thinking as quickly as you can, you immediately pick up a piece of the cake piece big enough to eat, and swallow it. You feel that familiar feeling as you look up at a flabbergasted Barney, sitting on the bed with his mouth wide open. Feeling yourself growing, you are left to ask yourself: how big are you going to get?
112112211212112.title: his room

choices: You have to look for Dora!
There's no time! You have to find the PPB
1121122112121121.content:
You feel your surroundings shrink as you catch up to Barney's knees. But already you felt signs of slowing down. To your dismay you stopped at Barney's waist: about 2 and a half feet tall. Barney's look of terror suddenly turned into a grin, as he quickly gobbled up a piece of cake himself. The reaction was immediate. The bed strained under the increasing weight of the now 8 ft teen. As he approached 10 feet, you noticed his shoes gaining size, creeping closer and closer toward you 2 and a half ft tall self. You backed away slowly, until you were standing right outside the room. Suddenly, the bed gave way under Barney's immense weight, making a very loud "CLASH" as the bedframe split in two. And Barney was still growing; it was slowing down, but he was getting bigger nonetheless.

You think to yourself: "If he ends up destroying the house, I'll never find Dora!" Dora was still shrunken, wandering somewhere around the house...
1121122112121121.title: Stop at Barney's waist

1121122112121122.content:
Soon enough, your eye line reaches the height of Barney's kneecaps, but it didn't stop there. You look up at Barney's face, and can sense the fear in his eyes as he backs away into the corner of the room. As you grow you can see your own body filling the once empty room. Finally you reach your original height, but your growth doesn't stop there. You are now looking down at Barney, as your head approaches the ceiling. And just as your head touches the ceiling, the growth subsides.
"I told you not to mess around" you say to him. "Now look at me! I'm huge!"
But just as you sat it Barney suddenly jumps for the remains of the cake on the ground. If he gets a bite it could mean disaster for the both of you!
1121122112121122.title: Grow 10 feet tall

choices: You get a face full of cake
11211221121211221.content:
Acting fast you grab the cake before Barney could get his hands on it. He glared at you and tried to snatch it away to with you raise the cake a few feet above his head.
"I'm not going to have you turn into a giant; again." You hiss at him. He just rolls his eyes at you and begins to slowly walk away. Once you hear his foot steps disappear in the distance you slowly lower the cake to eye level. "Now what am I going to do with this?" You ask quietly. "Hiding it would just mean Barney could find it again while holding onto it might mean an ambush attack; aside from that Dora needs the cake to change back to her original size" You lowered you gaze to look at the ground. "And I still need to change back as well." You where getting pretty sick of all the size changing. Just then you hear the pounding of feet. You turn around to see Barney running full speed at you. You raise the cake as close to the ceiling as you can with out crushing it. But Barney was still running toward you. It took you a second for you to realize that he wasn't going for the cake he was going for you. By the time you figured that out it was already to late as Barney went and jumped on you. The unexpected push made you lose balance and begin to fall backwards; while the cake fell out of your hand. Does Barney get the cake or does something else happen?
11211221121211221.title: Safe...For now

choices: He still grew faster but at a continuous rate.
He started to have short but sudden growth spurts.
11212.content:
You decided not to leave Barney for a second, as the squirell might escape. You really do hate Barney, but if his parents find out he's been taken by a squirell, they'll freak. You follow the squirrel into another yard and watch it climb up the nearest tree. It puts down Barney on one of the branches, and leaves. It must have discovered he's not a nut after all...

Barney just stands on the branch, yelling at you. You walk over to it, only to find that it is out of your reach.
"Just jump down, I'll catch you!" You said to him, holding your hands out. He just kept yelling at you. The only way to retrieve him is the climb the tree. Barney wasn't very high up, but it was an inconvenience. Once you reach his branch, he is quickly intimidated by your size. Thankfully, he is still an inch tall, and has not shrunken any more.
"Climb on" you tell him, holding your hand out to him. Cautiously, he obeys. You carefully climb down the tree to the ground.

For a few seconds, you just stood there, looking at your shrunken cousin. Here is the kid that has been bullying you all this time, a mere 1 inch tall. It was surely amusing.

Quickly, you return back to the house looking for the cake. Thankfully, Dora went back to watching TV, and didn't go finding your purple peanut butter anywhere. Once you found the cake, you took a small crumb of the chocolate icing and held it out to Barney. He ate it.

At first, nothing happened. But then, you noticed that Barney was growing, but very slowly. Within a few minutes he was back to 6 inches tall.
"Wow, that stuff is great!" you hear Barney say as he was reaching a foot in height, "I want more!"
Before you can avoid it, he jumped up and snatched a small handful of cake from your hand, and shoved it into his mouth. This was bad.
11212.title: Time is of the essence.

choices: His growth finally stops, but he gets stuck in the room
He destroys the house this way
112121.content:
Looking at him closely, you could see that he was slowly growing taller. In a few seconds he was up to 3 feet tall, and meeting your waist.
"Wow! This feels great!" Barney exclaimed.
"I'm sure it does..." you say under your breath.

Helplessly you watch Barney's body slowly come back to his original size, but it didn't stop there. You expected that.

"Wait, what's wrong? Why am I still growing?" Barney said with a hint of panic in his voice, his height approaching 7 feet.
"The cake is not an antidote to the purple peanut butter, it just made you bigger. When does it stop? I couldn't say." you said to him, slowly backing away as Barney's body started to fill the room.
"Ow! What the-" Barney looked up to see that his head had hit the 10 foot ceiling. He was so tall now that you only reached up a little above his waist.
112121.title: He still grew faster but at a continuous rate.

choices: He tries to break out of the house
1121211.content:
It had already been over a minute so far and Barney's body was half the size of the room, and getting bigger by the second. Too big to crouch, he had to sit down so his head wouldn't burst through the cieling. Even with his legs cross legged, his feet collided with the front wall of the room, and his back pressed against the wall behind him. As you stepped out through the doorway, one of his legs grew in front of it, partially blocking your view. All you could see was his body continously filling the room. All of a sudden, his growth showed signs of slowing down.
"Thank god!" Barney exclaimed. He thought for sure that we would grow right out of the house. But now he was stuck.
"Good riddance..." you said to yourself. Barney deserves to be stuck for the rest of his life after all the mean things he's done to you.
But, little did you know, something else was about to happen...
1121211.title: His growth finally stops, but he gets stuck in ...

11212112.content:
You decide to leave Barney there and teach him a lesson, but no sooner after you turned around, he started shaking his body side to side, in an attempt to destroy the walls and free himself.
"Is he crazy?" you ask yourself. If Barney breaks the house the blame will probably be put on you. Quickly you turn back to the room filled with Barney's huge body. You can hear him groan as he tries to crush the walls around him. You crouch under his enormous leg blocking the doorway, now appearing in his sight.
"Barney, stop!" you try to tell him.
"Stop? You did this to me!" he cried, trying even harder now to free himself. And it was starting to work. The walls became looser and looser as he pushed against them. You climb on top of his chest and stand right in front of his huge head.
"If you do this, you'll destroy your own house."
"Well I...you...uhhh....fine." he said, coming to this sad conclusion. 'But what the heck am I supposed to do? I'm like 20 ft tall and stuck in this stupid room!" he said as the sound of his voice echoed through the house.
"I know, but theres nothing i can really do about it. You were the one who decided to shove the entire cake in your mouth anyways. You were only supposed to grow back to normal." you reply.
"And who made me shrink in the first place?" Barney said, glaring at you. This argument was going nowhere.
"Look, I'm sorry I gave you that sandwich. I don't know what got into me. I just wanted to get back at you for all the things you did to me." you said.
"Alright. And I'm sorry I ate the rest of the cake. And if i ever get out of this room, I'm sorry I picked on you for so many years. It just felt good for some reason, like eating that cake." he said. "How about we start over?" Barney held up his humongous hand to you, and taking one finger, you shook hands in agreement.
"Well, we have two options. Wait until you eventually shrink back, or I'll try to find that peanut butter. I though I used it all for the sandwich, but maybe we can get a small amount."
11212112.title: He tries to break out of the house

112121121.content: You decied to wait it out until Barney either shrinks or you find the p.b. You decied to look for the peanut butter. You Climb off Barney and onto the floor and begin to search.
112121121.title: Wait it out

1121211212.content: You start searching the gorund. You walk around Barney's now giant feet and see a small peice of cake in teh corner. You think" well mabey i can help if i get a little bigger" so you take a small bite out of the cake and...
1121211212.title: Find cake

choices: you try to calm Dora down
1121212.content:
Suddenly, you watch in horror as Barney grew bigger. "I'm getting larger!" Barney yelled, now pressing against the walls.
You then gasped, as the walls and the ceiling began to crack. Dora ran over. "The house is breaking!" she cried." She grabbed my hand and led me out of the house, just as it collapsed. Dora was worried. What had happened to Barney?
1121212.title: He destroys the house this way

choices: He destroys the house with his growth spurts
He gets stuck in the hallway
112122.content:
Suddenly, Barney shot up to two feet tall.
"Woah!" He said, "That was fast!"
He then shot up to four feet, as fast as he had done before. He had a grin on his face, and he was looking right at you, even if he was still a midget.
You knew where this was going, and it wasn't going to be good.
Still grinning, Barney suddenly shot up another three feet, finally becoming taller than you.
"Sup squirt. Thanks for the cake."
You start to run down the hallway, but Barney is already hot on your heels. Just as he is about to catch you he shoots up another three feet, his head hitting the cieling. This startled Barney, and he stopped chasing you. You stopped running. Barney was now forced to crouch so his head wouldn't be pushed against the cieling.
112122.title: He started to have short but sudden growth spurts.

choices: Barney has grown 100 feet tall and is still growing!
Barney is still growing  and somehow has the jar of purple peanut butter
1121221.content:
You turn around as you hear Barney's head hit the ceiling. He seems stuck for the time being, so you start running again to try and find some way to reverse whatever it is.

Meanwhile, Barney slowly turned around and headed back towards the cake. Before you realize that he turned around he's reached it, and has the remainder in his hand, heading towards his mouth. Just before the cake falls in, crumbs and all, another growth spurt hits Barney, shooting him up four feet this time, causing his head to break through the ceiling and causing the floor to groan.

"Uh-oh" you think. "He's growing quicker and at a bigger rate".

The cake is swallowed, in two huge gulps, and Barney turns back towards you, squatting and with murder in his eyes.

But he didn't move, he just waited. And he kept growing as you looked on in fear. Two growth spurts later, the floor collapsed beneath you, and you ran before the house could collapse around you. There was no time to get Dora, it was every man for himself.

Just as you escaped the house, it all fell in on itself making a huge din, with Barney's laughter above it.

You turn around and see...
1121221.title: He destroys the house with his growth spurts

choices: Dora and Barney shrink to half an inch tall.
The peanut better works on neither of your cousins.
113.content:
"I want some too!" Dora screams, before anyone has a chance to do anything. She immediately makes for the garbage and scoops up the other half of the sandwich and eats it.

Even better, you think to yourself, imagining the fun you could have when your annoying cousins shrink down to size.

Next:
113.title: They both shrink

choices: You decide to put them in your empy fish tank for a while.
You want to put them both in Dora's dollhouse and torture them.
1131.content:
As you continue watching TV, you begin to notice your two cousins shrinking. What's funny is that they don't notice it. Once both of them are so small that you can't see them from your chair, you stand up.

You walk over to Barney's seat and see him in the process of climbing down the leg of his recliner -- and he looks utterly confused. Noticing your shadow over him, he turns his head and sees you smiling down at him. To his shock, you place your palm underneath and him raise it and scoop him up in it. Suddenly you hear something squeaking below. With Barney still in your hand, you look down at your feet and see Dora between them.

She's just as small as Barney now and looks more like a tiny ant next to your foot from where you're looking. You grin. You're tempted to just crush Dora like a bug, the way she's annoyed you so much, but you see her tugging at the laces of your right sneaker.

"Hey Dora," you say, grinning. "What do you think you're doing, pipsqueak?"

Realizing she's not afraid of you, you become annoyed. She appears to be trying to climb up your sneaker from the front now, and finally makes it on to the top area that covers your toes. You're amused by the idea of this, the crouch down and pick her up with two fingers and place her in the hand that is still holding Barney. You bring the two of them up to your face to get a good look at your uneasy cousins.
1131.title: Shrunk cousins

choices: Let Dora remain on the bottom of your feet for a while.
11312.content:
Holding your tiny cousins in your palm at eye level, you grin at them and say "Hey Dora, didn't you want me to play with your dollhouse earlier with you? Well, I'm ready to play with it now." Barney and Dora are both yelling something at you but due to the tremendous difference in your sizes, you can't make it out. Ignoring their pleas, you bring your hand down from your face and drop your cousins inside your jeans pocket and make your way to Dora's room.

It's full of stuffed animals, girly toys, and of course Dora's dollhouse. It's about as high as your knees and is meant for little girls. Even Dora was too old to be playing with it in your opinion. You step forward to the dollhouse and grab your two squirming cousins from your pocket with your fingers. You crouch down with your knees bent and set the two of them down in front of you and motion for them to go inside. Realizing that this would only be fun if you had other toys of Dora's to destroy, you walk over to her shelves and grab one of her dolls. You step toward the dollhouse and stop in front of it. You only see Barney at the door. You're confused because he appears to be jumping up and down. "Where's Dora?," you ask perplexed. Then he starts pointing at your foot...

Your eyes widen. You just squashed your cousin, you think. You immediately check the bottom of your feet to see if you really did crush her when you stepped over to the dollhouse. You lift your right foot and see nothing. Then, you lift your left and see her. She's held by a piece of gum that you must have stepped on and it's stuck between the treads on the bottom of your sneaker. You're relieved.
11312.title: Stuck

choices: Screw this.  Crush Barney like a puny insect.
113121.content:
As much as you think Dora deserves to be stuck in a piece of gum under your feet for a while, you also realize the that it's likely you would crush her as you walk. You continue to holding your foot up and see that she's held pretty tightly inside the gum. You reach down and carefully peel the entire piece of gum off your sneaker and lower it. You hold Dora up to your face and smile as she continues to squirm out it, which seems to be impossible.

You don't think you can pull her out of the gum without squashing her with your fingers so you just put the dry gum with Dora in it inside your jeans pocket for now.

So the dollhouse idea is bust. You see that Barney is still standing below you at your feet.
113121.title: Gummy

choices: May as well squish Dora too
1131211.content:
Being so big compared to your tiny cousins has got you thinking... if you were to step on Barney, there's no way you could be held accountable. The only way for your aunt and uncle to possibly find out if it was you who would be to check the bottom of your feet or if Dora told on you. The latter shouldn't be too much of a problem. You see Barney still looking up at your enormous visage from between your two feet. You grin.

Slowly, you lift your right foot into the air and watch Barney's expression. At this point he probably thinks you're just stepping it forward. Then, you center your foot over him in the air and smile at him. Slowly you bring your foot down. As it closes in on him, you see him waving his arms around to persuade you to stop, but you ignore it. You speed up and land your foot down hard on your tiny cousin and hear a crunch. Grinning, you pivot left and right to smear his little guts around to make sure he's completely squashed. That was was pretty exhilarating. You lift your right foot into the air and glance down. On the bottom of your sneaker, between a flattened daddy-long legs spider you unknowingly stepped on earlier, and a few smashed ants from an anthill you did knowingly demolish, you see a smeared Barney.

Pretty cool. It's good to be big.
1131211.title: Squash time.

choices: Smash or squeeze your puny cousin.
11312112.content:
You reach into your jeans pocket and scoop the tiny Dora from inside and raise her to your face. She appears to have freed herself from the gum she was stuck in under your shoe. As usual, your ant-sized cousin is screaming something at you but you can't hear her. You blow at her and knock her over in your hand and laugh. "Sorry, but I don't talk to people who can't speak loud enough that I can hear them." Still in your palm, she stands up. "Tell me why I don't crush you like a bug, Dora. You know that I can. No answer, huh?"

You can't really have any fun with Dora at this size without killing her, so you think you wanna increase her mass a little. You reach into your other pocket and grab a few crumbs of the cake and drop it on your palm so that Dora can get to it. "Eat now." She eats it, and slowly her size increases quite a bit. She's about the size of cell phone and you can hear her talking now. Once she opens her mouth though, you immediately say "Shut up. I can still smash you if I want. No talking." You close your palm around her and grip her tightly in your fist, her head sticking out on top. "Should I squeeze?" you say, grinning.

You kneel down and drop her at your feet and rise back to your full height. "I need to you clean my sneakers. I flattened Barney and he's stuck all over the bottom." You lift your massive foot over Dora's head and pin her on her back with it. "I'll just wipe him on you, okay?" You pivot your foot left and right over her, being careful not to put to much weight and crush her. You take your foot off and pick her back up before she can run away. Clenching her little body in your hand, you squeeze her tightly until she cries out. You laugh. You open up your palm and bring it to one side and make a fist with your other hand and get ready to smash her.
11312112.title: Torture Dora.

choices: "Time for a peanut covered Dora snack!"

Then you hear your name being called. You shove Dora back in your pocket and keep you hand in there so she is sqeezed against your leg making sure she can breathe. Your Aunt is standing in the door way. "Where's Barney?", she asks you. "He's out playing baseball with his friends", you lie' " And Dora is asleep." She frowns and says, "Can you bait the mouse traps with peanut butter?" You glady take the jar with a new idea of torture.

You kiss your Aunt bye and walk down to the basement. Once you hear her car pull away you take Dora out of your pocket. She looks at the peanut butter then at you. You Smile and Say
113121121.title: Its Smashing Time!

You decide to warn her "If you move the trap will shut on you" Then you carry it up to your room and hide it under your bed. You set the rest of the traps and decide to
1131211211.title: Come Here Bait

11312112112.content: You hear a loud SNAP as you walk to your trap. You run to check on Dora. The trap is up side down so you flip it. Dora is being crushed by the wait of the metal bar so you carefuly slip her out. She is terrifed which brings you back to your humanity. You carry her to the bathroom and take of her clothes. You carefully bathe her so she is clean and put her in some doll clothes.Then you get the biggest shock of your life somethings on your leg.
11312112112.title: Ouch

1131212.content:
You look down at Barney and give him a stern look. "Get in the dollhouse. We're going to be playing "Attack of the Giant Alien" and you're going to be the victim.

Barney doesn't move. Instead, he starts hollering something at you. You stand right over him and lift one of your feet into the air. Immediately Barney begins to cower. You bring your foot down hard and fast with a stomp on the wooden floor, missing him only by an inch. The impact of your weight knocks Barney backwards, and the sight of your massive sneaker beside him sends him running into the front door of the dollhouse. You smile proudly at how easily intimidating it is when you have the advantage of size. You pick Dora out of your pocket again and see that she has freed herself from most of the gum. You drop her down as well and nudge her into the dollhouse with your toe.

The wooden dollhouse is larger, reaching up to your knees. Inside are little figures of a family. You announce loudly, so that Barney and Dora can hear, as they look out from the upstairs windows... that you are the giant alien, and that their only job is to live. Without any further warning, you lift as high into the air as you can and stomp down on the window that Dora is peeking out of. You smirk as her head darts in before your massive foot demolishes the entire upstairs bedroom of the dollhouse. Wooden splinters go flying out from the hole you make in the roof. Dora has run into a hallway. You step over the dollhouse so that both feet are straddling the entire structure. Then, you lift your other foot into the air and kick through the side of the house, ripping open the hallway. You crouch down and inside you see Barney. You move your face away and reach your arm through the hole in order to grab Barney. Unfortunately he slips through your large fingers and makes it into another room. You see exactly where he has gone and again stomp your foot through the roof, laughing all the while. You look around through the broken furniture and floor to find him. Not seeing either of them, you decide to do something even more exciting.

You lean over and pick the dollhouse entirely up with both arms into the air and shake it violently. Inside you hear furniture crashing and breaking. Suddenly, you hear a slight wizzing sound next at the side of your head. You turn and see three police helicopters flying next to you and a dozen police cars below them at your feet. You quickly pocket your two cousins and think.

You believe that you can probably outrun the police force because of your increased size and speed, but on the other hand, you're so big that the helicopters are no larger than flies to you and the police cars are the size of ants.

"No way kid" you tell him, "I gotta bring you back home."

"No is no!" you tell him, and with that, you sweep him up and start walking back to the kid's house. You drop him on the door step.

A huge fleet of police cars are surrounding you in one full circle. There is no way you can escape this now. What are you going to do?
1211212.title: Caught!

12112121.content:
You know that you could take care of all those police cars just by stepping on them like bugs, but it wouldn't be nice. So you reach into your pocket, grab some peanut butter, swallow it, and watch as the world beneath you comes closer into view. You reach the size you were before, more or less, and you're standing in your own formerly giant footprint, in the backyard of someone's house.

You hop the fence and find the kid you left at the doorstep. He of course knows who you are and is shouting it, so you tell him to eat some peanut butter so he can get big, which makes him elated.

You watch him swallow your peanut butter and shrink to the size of a tiny ant between your two feet. He knows you tricked him and he's pretty mad, because the little guy is still yelling. You scare him by lifting your foot over his head as though you were going to squash him. He makes a break for it but you just stamp your foot down in front of him to block his path and he knocks into the side of your sneaker. You laugh.
12112121.title: Hide and get smaller.

121121211.content: You get bored toying with the little kid who is desperately trying to run for the yard, so you let him gain a little distance from you. You watch the 1 cm. tall kid run by the length of your sneaker (it takes him a few seconds) and into the grass. You follow him with your eyes, grinning, as he heads for safety into the grass blades. Then, you take about five steps and you're on him again. You spot him in the grass blades looking up at your enormous visage in terror. You raise your foot into the air over his head and watch the cool shadow envelop him. He tries to run but you quickly bring your foot down with a firm stomp. You feel the puny kid's body crunch underneath your sneaker. You suspect that the weight of your vast foot has flattened him nicely. Then, you pivot your foot side to side as though you were putting out a cigarette or demolishing an anthill, which you've done plenty of times out of boredom.
121121211.title: Crush the little pest.

choices: Shrink down, and trick other people into shrinking.
1211212111.content:
You lift your foot from its place and gleefully glance down at the smashed body of the kid you just stepped on for fun. It's actually a little sticky. He's utterly flattened to a pulp. You hope his parents don't mind... but just in case you do, you reach into your pocket now that the sirens are gone and eat some cake. Swallowing a sizeable chunk, you grow to about 300 feet. Your feet have completely pulverized the ground beneath them from their huge weight, and they've grown over the house the kid belongs to, including a few others nearby. Convenient. You didn't even need to lift one foot up, and you still crushed the kid's place and whoever was inside.

You eat a few more bites of the cake, which has grown with you (which is awesome) and you reach probably around 800 or so feet. A few whole blocks are right now smothered beneath your vast feet. Like a child playing with ants, you stare down at the neighboorhood below you and shuffle and stamp your feet around, smiling. It's pretty cool being a giant, you think. You feel like godzilla.

After you kicked over and smashed some houses, a wicked grin on your face all the while, you take a few steps over to the baseball diamond, one large foot on each side of the field. Each sneaker extends the entire length of the field as you look down at the ground, you see all the terrified kids under your crotch, staring up at your huge face in terror. They look like tiny little ants crawling in between your feet.

You pull some peanut butter out of your pocket and eat some until you're the same size as the kids. They all run toward you excitedly. They ask how you became a giant. You lie, telling them you're just a giant alien come to examine the puny people. You tell them that they could be giants too, if they ate some of the peanut butter. They cry out for it, and you hand them all some.

You watch as the entire team of baseball kids shrink down to the size of bugs, and there you are looking down at them between your two feet again. You grin, pick the kids up one at a time between your thumb and forefinger, and put them in your pocket.
12112121111.title: Shrink down, and trick other people into shrink...

12112122.content: You take out the chocolate cake and eat the whole thing. Immediately, the tingling sensation comes back and you start growing. You are growing so fast that you pass 100 feet tall in a second. You can feel your foot pressing against a house, eventually crushing it. Your foot is now the size of two houses, and still growing. You want to stop growing now, but since you ate the whole cake you are still getting bigger and bigger. Finally, you stop growing at a whopping 1 mile high, otherwise known as 5280 feet. You have already crushed all the police cars as well as a whole neighborhood under your foot.
12112122.title: Too Big for Your own good

choices: Have some fun and stomp on a large city.
121121221.content:
At a mile high, your feet have grown so large that the entire neighborhood and all its inhabitants have just been crushed underneath them. At first you feel bad for all people that you inadvertently killed but at the same time you had no idea you would get this large from the entire cake. You try to think of it as though you had just flattened an anthill, which you've done plenty of times back home.

You also realize that no matter what direction you began walking, there would be no way to avoid demolishing buildings and squashing a lot of people beneath your feet. Staying where you were wouldn't do any good for you either though, so you shrug it off and begin taking large strides forward. You look at the ground where you've stepped and see gaping footprints you left in the earth filled with rubble from the buildings you've flattened. You determine that there is no amount of peanut butter in the world large enough to bring you back to normal so you think you'd better get used to being a rampaging giant. After walking a bit more, you lift your right foot and look at the bottom of it. There are cars, buildings, and people all crushed between the treads of your sneakers. It's actually sort of cool being this big, you think. You also notice that there are people trying to climb on top of your sneaker to avoid falling off 800 feet and dying. Some of them are even climbing into the tiny space between your sock and the opening of your sneaker. You chuckle, amused with the idea that if those people don't die getting crushed while you walk, they might as well die from the smell of your giant feet.

The only question for you though is what to do next.
121121221.title: Dayam, you're big.

1211212211.content:
You can't believe how you've gotten so big. You're so tall now that at this point you can see the curviture of the earth, barely. The air around you is cold. You're curious to see how high you can grow, and the cake in your pocket has grown with you so who knows how enormous you would get if you ate it all. You reach in and grab some out and swallow it all. Suddenly you black out.

You wake up and see blackness and stars. You're in outerspace, you think. And you can breathe. Maybe a residual effect of the cake? Wait a minute, you're bigger than the earth. That must be what happened. You look around for it everywhere, spinning your head. You see it. It looks like a tiny blue pea in front of your face. You wonder what everyone on Earth is thinking, or if they can even see you. You reach out your hand and cup the Earth in your palm and grin wickedly. All these people are playthings for your amusement now. Floating around still, you bring the earth up to your face and you blow on it. A light dust comes off of the planet. You've probably just blew half the population off to their doom, along with half their cities. Then you suck in air around it and watch the dust go into your mouth. You feel things on your tongue, people, buildings, then you swallow. Finally you take the planet and swallow that too, wondering how many people are left to be digested in your massive innards.

You're bored now, so you blow in a direction to propel you through space, going fast due to your size, looking for the next planet to consume and continue your existence as a titanic planet-eater.
1211212211.title: Have some fun and stomp on a large city.

You slowly open your eyes as you awake. Whew! Was that a nice nap! You really feel rejuvenated. You start to get out of bed, or so you think. You can't move. You start to look around the room. You have definitely grown. Your head is pressed against the ceiling, and the rest of your body is taking up all the space in your room. You have doubled your original size. Crap. You try to move again, but its no use. You're stuck in your own room. Suddenly, there's a knock on your door. You notice that your foot, which is almost half the size of the door, it holding it shut.
"Hey in there!" your aunt shouts from outside of your room. "We're going shopping! Should be back in a few hours!"
"Alright..." you reply. At least they won't become a problem, you think to yourself. Suddenly, you feel a tingling sensation inside of you. You feel your body pressing against the room around you as you grow bigger.

CRASH!

Wood splinters fly as you burst out of your house, crushing the whole thing under your immense weight. Oops, you say to yourself. You get up to find that your are now 30 feet tall.

"Don't worry" you say to them in your booming voice. "I may be huge, but I'm friendly"

You turn around and walk towards the other side of town, leaving imprints on the pavement with your huge feet. What should you do now?

Suddenly, you heard a loud CRACK and a slight gush of air, as your feet broke open the opposite wall of the basement. "At least that took the pressure off my head" you thought to yourself. But that should be the least of your worries now.
123121.title: You end up destroying most of the house

You suddenly feel tired and black out, falling onto your bed. You wake up while noticing only an hour has passed. You walk downstairs. Your clothes feel rather tight as you step down. You notice your feet are larger than the step. Your are still groggy and disregard it. Your uncle is sitting at the table reading the newspaper, while your aunt is frying eggs. You sit down as the other two simultaneously start to look at you and say "Good mor-". They gasp and stare at you. You look down and notice that...
1232.title: The change in size is not that noticable

choices: Leap on to one of their shoes
Follow one of them on foot
13.content:
You decide to go Bond for right now and spy on you cousins. You don't know why, but you found it pretty cool to be so small that you were looking at people without them having any idea you were there. You did a little experimenting over the last year, and found out that if you just eat a small bit of the purple goo you shrink instantly, rather than over a long period of time if you eat a whole bunch at once. Why is still a mystery, but you've never really taken the time to care.

Unscrewing the lid to the jar, you notice again that despite the fact that you cleaned out the jar only a few weeks ago, it is now almost full with the strange substance you have yet to think of a better name for than purple peanut butter. You stick the tip of your finger inside the gooey soft gunk, and are surprised that it is still cool, even though it must have been sitting in your hot suitcase for over an hour on the ride from airport to the house.

Pulling your finger out again you make sure that a little dollop of the purple goo remains on its tip. Looking at it you are once again amazed that something that so resembles a common foodstuff, even though it is not the right color, can do something so weird. Sniffing it you find that the aroma, a mixture of peanut butter, jelly, and something else you can't identify, seems even stronger now than it did the last time you opened the jar.

You are just about to eat the little bit of purple peanut butter when you suddenly remember the cake. It is the only antidote you know to the shrinking effect. Whether this is because it was designed to be, or if it is supposed to make you grow, you have no idea. You've never eaten the cake alone. After all as a shrunken kid it's easy to sneak around, but as a hundred foot tall goliath you're pretty sure someone would notice you.

Still you can't just leave the cake on top of the dresser. You remember the first time you shrank at home, and you ended up having to climb up your own dresser to get at the cake. Your parents had chewed you out terribly about being missing for almost twenty-four hours. They had nearly called the police, little knowing that their son was still in his room, just feeling a little down. Down to about a forth of an inch actually. Luckily you left your top drawer open and a handy thread was there to help you finish your climb hours earlier than you would have otherwise.

Staring around the room you don't see any really place to put the cake. At your own home you just slip it under the bed, but the guest bed in your current room is only about an inch off the floor, way to low to slip the cake under. With no better place in sight you finally decide to put the cake on the other side of the dresser, out of sight of the door. Hopefully you'll want to grow back long before anyone comes searching for you in your room.

Setting the cake down you take one last tentative look around your room. Considering you've only been in it for about twenty minutes the only thing that looks out of place is the suitcase, which is stuffed into a corner. With nothing else left to do you place you finger on you tongue and then suck the purple goo off it. The taste is even better than you remember, and you wonder somewhere in the back of your mind if this is what doing drugs is like, but then the pink dots begin to play in front of your eyes, and everything around you seems to be getting farther away.

You're shrinking and quite fast. Within a few seconds everything in the room looks like a scenic mesa view, with shag carpeting for waving plains, and an oak wood dresser and bed frame for mesas. The scene is beautiful, or at least it would be if you didn't have this nagging voice in the back of your mind that insisted on reminding you that you are now smaller than most household pests, and that you were nearly killed last time you did this in this particular home.

You shout down that nagging little voice. As you always do in this situation, and begin the trek to the living room. You are quickly of the opinion that maybe you should have shrunk after you were in sight of the two you wanted to spy on, as at your current height it will take you hours to get to the living room, most of those spent traversing the stairs. Still you can't back out now. You're gonna go spy on Barney and Dora for a while, hear what they say about you when you're not around, and then get them back for it later.

The jog to the living room takes less time than you thought, as you find a helpful baseboard running along the bottom of the stairs that you find just the right height to climb onto. Pulling yourself on top of it you ride it like a slide down to the ground floor of the house. Unfortunately you find yourself unable to stop and then slide along the tiled floor as you land with several grunting noises as you collide with the hard surface.

Despite the rather rough landing you are still conscious. Pulling yourself up you check your arms and legs to see if you broke anything, and then rub your temples to try and fight off the headache which is a result of righteous face plant you did right off the bat. Luckily you don't seem very injured, and besides a splitting headache you are pretty sure you're going to be fine.

However, you are dismayed to discover that the two you are planning on spying on are getting up. The television beyond them is showing the credits of whatever show it was they were watching, and now, bored with the TV, their going into other parts of the house. You notice a moment later that both their massive forms are coming towards you. You realize almost instantly that you can leap onto one of their shoes, or try and follow them on foot, though that annoying voice in the back of your mind is screaming at you to hide, or go back upstairs. You could of course ignore everything and just sit right where you are as they pass by and watch them from here for a few minutes. What do you do?
13.title: A spying we will go

131.content: Against your better judgement you decide to leap onto one of their shoes. At your size you're pretty sure that either one of them could walk faster than you could run. Many times faster in fact, and you don't want to lose them. Looking at them you try and guess where they are going. By the way he's holding his stomach you're pretty sure Barney is going into the kitchen for a snack, while Dora seems to be holding her hand against the wall, which she usually does when she intends on going upstairs. Who's shoes do you leap for?
131.title: Hitching a ride, but with who?

1311.content:
With a grunt of effort, and a little helping hand from the strength you acquired last summer, you leap for your target. Luck is again on your side as you land among Barney's laces without him feeling a thing. Unaware of his little passenger, Barney continues on route to the kitchen, just as you predicted, and Dora also does exactly what you thought she'd do, and runs up the stairs as fast as her little legs can carry her, obviously bound for the bathroom.

Your view of the world consists of Barney's shoe for a long while, as he walks about the kitchen, obviously deciding what he wants to eat. After a moment or two of deep thought, something rare for him, Barney walks over to a cabinet, and stands on his tip toes so he can reach something on a high shelf. Unfortunately his shoe tilts almost ninety degrees to the floor when he stands on his tip toes, and you go sliding once more on to the tiled floor of your aunt and uncle's house.
