First, you cut a thing, thin slice of cake, and then stick your finger in the cool purple stuff, getting out just a dollop of it. You look at this hungrily for a moment before carefully putting it on the cake. Now it looks like the cake has been decorated with violets. You stare at it until you can stare know more. You attack it.

Once you are done, you carefully wipe your mouth and lick your finger, than sit down and wait for something to happen. Suddenly, blue lights start to play in front of your eyes. You grow dizzy for a second, and as it clears up you watch the world grow around you. You close your eyes; the process is a bit more disorienting than usual. When you open your eyes, the world has changed. Your standing knee deep in the multicolored grass of your carpet, looking up at the building sized furniture of your guest room. You frown. Something’s not right. Than it hits you. YOU’RE TOO BIG!

You had eaten a small enough dollop of purple peanut butter to make you a half inch tall, yet here you are, almost six inches tall. Suddenly, it hits you. You had eaten too much cake! You tried to keep the amount low, but the cake is equally as potent as the peanut butter. You usually eat only a crumb and some icing to get you back to full size. You had eaten what looked like the same amount, but what was really at least a hundred times that size. You guess that with the large amount of cvake you had eaten, and the small amount of peanut butter, you had shrunk less, but now the effect is permanent!

After a few minutes of yelling and waving your arms in the air, you calm down enough to realize that maybe this size isn't so bad, you can explore the house! And that also the power of the food is probably still there, if only you make the right choice about it. So right then and there…
14.title: Probaly shouldn't have tried that combination.

141.content:
Suddenly, the floor shakes and you hear a deep, rumbling voice:

"Hey twerp! I haven't forgotten about last summer!" You whirl. Barney is standing in the doorway, looking around the room. Normally a goliath at your shrinking size, he is still over seventy feet tall! And he's out for revenge. You freeze as he walks forward, knowing that any motion might give away your position. He walks into the middle of the room, looking around in confusion. Thankfully, he apparently doesn't notice the purple peanut butter.

Your mind starts to work again and you slowly, carefully, edge your way closer to the bed, hoping to dive under it. Unfortunately, Barney has the same Idea. Even as you dive under the bed, Barney gets down on his hands and knees and peers under.

"No way he could it under there." he says to himself. Than his eyes lock on your retreating body. He looks at you in astonishment for a second. "One of Dora's dolls..." he muses to himself. You try to keep still, hoping he won't realize it is you. Unfortunately, he area under the bed is dusty. You try to hold it, but you finally give a wholloping AH-CHOO. Barney's hand darts forward and grabs you. Your newly toughened body withstands his rough handling, but you still feel as if you are in a vice. He stands up and brings your struggling body closer to examine. Slowly an evil grin spreads across his face.

"Ah, revenge is sweet." He says to himself. You struggle to breathe as he grins nastily. With that, he turns and walks out of the room towards...
141.title: Revenge is sweet

143.content:
"OOHHHH IIILLLLLLLIIIUUUMMMMM!" Calls the giant, sickly-sweet voice of Dora. You whirl around and freeze. Standing in the doorway is your giant younger cousin Dora. With her hair done up in braids and that nasty "little" grin plastered on her face, she's every bit the annoying brat you remember from last year. Now however, your much smaller than her, and there is an unfortunate commonality between your size and that of her dolls! Last year she made you play dolls with her and she'll do it again if she catches you.

Unfortunately, right at that moment Dora looks down.

"There you are." She squeals. She quickly drops to her hands and knees in front of you, causing you to fall backwards. She giggles that awful giggle. She examines you. "Its time to play dolls, Wanna play?" She asks you, high pitched words thundering in your ears. You shake your head firmly.

"No!" You shout at her. She frowns and pouts, and then her expression sets.

"Well, I don't Care! Mom said you were going to play with me and that's that." She reaches for you.

"Dora no, wait!" It's too late. She picks you up in her fist, swinging you around like any of her dolls. You've always hated this about Dora. She never seems to notice the size difference (or care that much about it), but she always takes advantage of it to make you play dolls, like last year when you were a foot shorter than her.

She gets out into the hall and firmly shuts the door. Oh no you think to yourself. Now you can't get back into your room for the cake! Dora heads down the hall, carelessly swinging you around. It's like a rollercoaster. Finally, she stops and plunks you down... in the middle of a circle of dolls. You look in horror at the blank expressions on the cheap plastic faces around you. Uh oh, is all you can think.

"Ok," says Dora, "we're going to play...
143.title: Dora's Dolls

choices: She finds a new outfit for you
She plays house with you and the dolls
1431.content:
"Let's play dress up!" Dora said as she went for a shoe box full of doll clothes.
You had a horrible sinking feeling in your stomach. Now that you couldn't grow back, you could possibly be her doll from now on! It would be easy for her to hide you from her parents...

Before you can think of it anymore, Dora returns from the box holding a pink doll dress for you.
"Dora, no!" You cried out.
The little girl just giggled again and reached down to pick you up. You screamed and struggled as Dora roughly took of your shirt and pants, leaving you in your underware. Dora then took the dress and roughly put it on you.

She set you down in front of her and admired her handy work.
"You look sooo cute!" Your younger cousin said in her sickeningly cute voice.
Her lightning fast hand grasped you once again.

What does she do now?
1431.title: Dress up

choices: Pushes you into the center of the room
14312.content: She plays a game of House with you against your will. After a while she gets bored and decides to leave her room and go to Barney's room. She crawls under the bed holding you tightly in her enormous hands. Then Barney walks in and Dora decides
14312.title: From house to torture

choices: Eat Cake and Peanut butter at the same time
Eat a small chunk of cake and go to sleep
Eat a small scoop of peanut butter and go to sleep
1432.content: We're going to play house Dora says as she throws a couple more dolls down next to you. For what seemed like ours she made you talk to other dolls and move, throwing you around in every direction, and eventually she decides she is done playing dolls. She picks you up and skips out of the room, twirling you around in the air. You realize you will never get back to your room and eat some cake if you don't escape now. You pull yourself out of Dora's grasp and make a run for it. She runs after you, but is unable to find you in the thick carpeting. She finally gives up and runs off, leaving you to go back to your room. Once you enter your room and make your way back to the cake you.....
1432.title: ...house

choices: Nah, I just need to wait.
145.content:
You know that you might be seen at this height, six inches is just asking for a pounding from Barney. You poke your head into the jar, it didn’t shrink down with you. Luckily the jar didn’t break on the floor. You poke your finger into a puddle of it that’s oozing towards you and you stick the goop in your mouth. You smile, you look behind you, but it seems that nothing is happening.

"Really?..."

You want to just get to a half inch and go spying on your cousins...
145.title: ...you try for the peanut butter

choices: Jump the gap, Kevin seems more gentle.
Stay on Barney's shoe, you'te only 1/32 of an inch tall, your not gonna make it.
1451.content:
You take another scoop, and then another, and another... You notice immediately that you are getting smaller. Four inches, two inches...

"Yes!" You scream as you reach a half inch tall. You hop out of the jar. You run towards the door. You snicker as you slide under the door and ninja your way to the living room. Barney is sitting on the couch. and it seems Dora is off in her room. You think about going to Dora's room, but playing house if you get caught is a pretty bad. Barney seems to zoned out watching Power Rangers to notice you. You wonder through the shag carpet forest. This stuff is older than the sixties and it smells like cigarette ash and cat pee. You climb up one of the strands... Wait... You left the room at a half inch tall. the shag carpet is roughly a half inch. how are you standing on one of them?...

...

You're still shrinking! Amazingly you didn’t even notice until now. You look up to Barney's shoes, you need to get his attention and get help before you shrink to nothing! You jump up and grasp onto the corner of his shoe. You start to climb, it takes you a moment, but you get to the tip of his shoe. Judging by how big the shoe is, you guess your about a 1/32 of an inch tall. Barney gets up, the door bell had rang. He lifts up his foot, it felt like you were on a rocket ship. He walks to the door, you feel like you’re about to throw up.

"Hey twerp!" Barney's booming voice.
"Come on Barney, call me Kevin!"

Barney tussles Kevin's hair.

You seen an opportunity, Kevin’s shoe is close enough for you to jump onto it. You only have a few seconds to jump the gap. As impossible as it seems, you know you can make it.
1451.title: All is one...

14511.content:
You make it, scrambling up his shoe you begin to climb his leg, hopefully you'll make it in time. You use the hairs on his leg to climb, but even though he must only be ten or twelve, the hairs on his legs are more than big enough to support you. You jump from hair to hair, you reach his knee. You notice that he's wearing shorts and grab a hold of a loose thread. Kevin and Barney eventually sit down on the couch and watch Power Rangers. Him sitting down means you can stand up and walk up his thigh. You finally get to his shirt. All you need to do is get to his ear, if you can do that, your home free. You climb up his shirt, only to realize that the gaps in-between the threads are getting bigger. At first you could barely fit your foot through them, now they seem to be the size of windows! This is not good, soon you'll be too small to climb, threads will be like... well, really large threads!

You get up to his collar. You have two options at this point, you can jump to his neck and take a short cut, or you can go the long way around to the back of his neck and grab onto his neck. You question if you can make this one, but last time you made it so it's probably safe. If you don’t hurry though you will be too small to do anything!
14511.title: Bean Stalk Climbing

145111.content:
You jump!

And slip, falling into his shirt.

You land on a hair on his chest. You're so small his tiny hairs are like fields of chest nut colored plastic. They feel strange, you get up and look around, you panic as you realize your trapped on this hair without anywhere to go! You know there’s a way to get somewhere, you still have time! There must be a way! All the other hairs are too far apart, and the drop down looks like it might kill you. You trip and fall, cursing has you hit your chin on the waxy brown hair. It's funny, all the time you were climbing his hairs, you never noticed they were that soft shade of brown. You begin to tear up, you just wanted to have a nice summer, and yet that adventurous spirit of just wanting to have some fun was the reason you would die today.

You're on your hands and knees, sniffling and sobbing. You're body gets smaller, tinier, weaker. Soon the hair seems like it’s the size of a city. You get up, and run towards Kevin’s chest. Maybe if you climb up his skin you can make it to his ear. You get there after a few minutes and realize that a flake of skin is the size of the entire town that you lived in. You get on his skin and start climbing up the first flake, but soon your body is too small. Insignificant the flake, maybe only 1/64th of an inch in size, is the size of a large city, then a country, then the world itself. You think about it, you must be inconceivably small. You sob even more.

"It's not fair!"

You give up. There’s no way, the only option is to wait and see how small you get. The flake of skin begins to seem like your entire universe as you start to see cells. They get bigger and bigger. You slip inside past the cell wall and start traveling into the cell on a flake of skin on the chest of a boy named Kevin. You shrink even smaller still, the skin cell seems bigger than the largest house you've ever seen. You realize you’re not breathing! You gasp violently, but you can’t seem to take in any air. But you’re not actually suffocating. You seem to not need any oxygen. You wonder how... Soon you notice something very odd pass by. A very large Red squiggly thing just outside the cell. It's a red light wavelength... You remember the graph from your science class on some of the smaller things in the universe, one of them being light particles. You shrink smaller as you notice that there’s a very strange creature floating in the cell. It’s the common cold virus, but it's looks pretty dead... You shrink even smaller, Colors of all kinds flash just outside the cell that now seems like an entire planet of its own. The "sky" above is flashing with light wavelengths of all kinds. It’s so beautiful that you almost forget that you were shrinking. You pass by some DNA, and land on one of the proteins it’s made out of. The protein starts out the size of a large beach ball, than the size of a truck. Smaller and smaller your body still shrinks.

After a while you notice an atom fly by, it’s the size of a pea to you. Soon they become the size of golf balls, then basket balls. You grab on to one, hoping to survive the trip. You're now smaller than an atom, it seems like a carbon atom to you if you remember your chemistry right. it gets to be the size of a state soon, you stand up, watching the neutrons fly by. Smaller still. You grasp your body, you can start to recognize the feeling you had been putting in the back of your mind, the feeling of your body reducing in size. You hold on tight, as it rushes through every nerve in your body, the feeling of helplessness covers you like a silk blanket. Smaller and smaller now, you grab onto one of the flying neutrons like you did with the atom, it becomes the size of Canada to you not before long. You wonder the wastes of this insignificant particle, smooth like the most perfectly polished glass in the world, yet seemingly squishy like a water balloon. You notice that other objects fly by. Maybe things that make up neutrons. You watch them, laying down as you look overhead at the most beautiful thing you have seen so far. Everything all at once. A symphony of colors pass overhead, you smile. Smaller now than anything else, the neutron is the size of the sun compared to you. You notice something that you never thought you would see. A string. A string of pure energy. They seem to hold together the entire universe. These things are unbelievably small. They are about 10^-35 meters long. And they're nearly ten times your size.

Nothing but energy now. You are the smallest thing in the entire universe. If you were to compare, the universe is roughly 93 billion light years across. That’s 9.3x10^26 or 9,300,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 Meters. You are 10x10^-40 at the moment, or .00000000000000000000000000000000000000001 meters tall. You are only a fraction of a fraction, of a fraction. The hair that you once were on is wider than the know universe compared to you. The flake of skin is ten times size of the Local Group. The cell you are in is the size of your own Milky way. The atom is the size of the Pillars of Creation. And the neutron you are still floating around on is the about a light year in diameter.

You are the smallest thing to ever exist, and you exist on a ten year old boy's chest, who now seemed like your entire world. You're body is to tiny to even think about and thus you no longer exist to even the smallest of things. Smaller now, you are so tiny that the strings that hold the universe, the smallest things in all of reality is one billion times bigger than you. You continue shrinking; it's not as bad as you thought it would be. You accept your fate as the smallest thing within everything, all on a boys chest. A quick pop and a flash. The last thing you see is the energy of the strings surrounding your tiny body. You truly no longer exist.
145111.title: Smaller than anything to ever be.

145112.content:
You know it’s better to take the safe way. You shrink smaller done, but you're still making headway. HA get it!? HEAD WAY?!

You reach the back of his neck in no time. His pale delicate skin seems to simply drape over his long and thin neck, yet it’s the size of the biggest skyscraper, possibly more! It was scary, but you were going to have to climb up it...

You take the first foot into his skin, using his hairs as bracers, you climb, it’s a rough ride up, but you think pleasant thoughts. He must have taken a shower this morning, his hair smells like some kind of spice. He was probably using his moms shampoo, you chortle to yourself, this kid is already too girly. You get down to his ear. It’s a really big cave at this point! You suck in your breath, about to yell... but maybe that’s not such a good idea... if you yell, he might try to crush you with his finger, thinking your some kind of bug. But if your too quiet, he might not hear you, and you will shrink too small to even be heard.
145112.title: Help!!!

1451121.content:
You raise your hands around your mouth. "Hey! Can you hear me?" You say as loud as possible.

“Ow! Yes I can hear you Barney. Why are you yelling?” Says Kevin covering his ears.

“I’m not yelling!” Says Barney.

“No, I’m inside your ear! Don’t crush me!” You scream as Kevin reaches inside his ear with his finger.

“Oh I’m sorry.” Kevin says.

“Kevin, are you ok?” Says Barney.

“I was shrunk! I need you to take me to the guest room!” You yell out.

“Ok… Barney, where’s the guest room?” Says Kevin.

“It’s over there, it’s my twerp of a cousin’s room.” Says Barney.

Kevin gets up, and walks over. It feels like forever for someone just to walk down the hallway. You’re shrinking still, your down to half the size you were when you first climbed up his neck, you might not make it!

“Ok I’m here, now what?...” Kevin says.

“Ok, there’s cake on the floor.” You say, you have to yell as loud as you can for him to even be able to hear it as a whisper now. “Put the cake in your ear!”

“Ew, that’s gross, I don’t want to do that!” Says Kevin.

“There’s no time! I’m shrinking too small! Get the cake!!!” You scream out.

You shrink faster and faster, the ear that seemed like just a large cave was like you were just outside. You guessed you were only about 1/256th of an inch tall. There was no way you were gonna make this in time. All of a sudden a piece of cake is jammed in. You seemed like you were miles away from it though. You ran, you ran as fast as you could, you ran as fast as you could with all the determination of the world. Your tiny body shrank faster and smaller. You were a speck on a speck at this point. The cure was right there, and you wouldn’t make it time.

Suddenly you hear Baney come up from behind Kevin and slap him on the back. “There’s no one in here pal, my dorky cousin must have ran off.”

The slap on the back sent a crumb towards you. Smaller than the tip of a fork, and yet it was the size of an entire planet to you. You grab onto it, as it gets stuck in some ear wax. You take a bite.

Nothing.

Nothing.

You’re still shrinking.

You’re not gonna make it.

You feel your body getting smaller.

You would cease to exist…

It was over, you would not get to go back to school, you would never see your mom and dad, you would never get to live life. You had eaten more than enough cake to fill your tiny belly. You shrunk smaller and smaller, it was hopeless.
You notice that the crumb you were eating off was now the size of a basket ball…

You got to get out of here! You run out to the end of his ear. You jump out and land on his shirt collar. He notices you and grabs you. He clutches you with his hands, he squeezes tight as you look up at him. You’re going back to normal, he puts you down as you grow to be half his size, up to his shoulder, and now face to face.

“Whoa…” Both Barney and Kevin say in unison.

“So… um… wanna watch some Power Rangers?...” you say blushing.

The rest of the summer with your cousins is pretty relaxed. You find that Barney is really nice though Kevin. Though you still think Dora is still pretty twerpy. You spend what time is left of the summer playing with Barney and your new best friend Kevin.
1451121.title: Get Me Dat Cake!

1451122.content:
“Um, excuse me Mr. giant boy god sir… I was wondering if you coul—OMG WHAT IS THAT?!”

A giant finger appeared! It looks annoyed! (Because fingers can have expressions at your size) it slowly comes towards you.

“Aidez-moi maman! Le doigt m'écraser! Why am I crying in French!?” You say to yourself as it backs you into the ear drum. It pushes you, you hear the poping of your own bones and… Squish. You are smushed by his finger. He pulls his finger out, you lifeless body is mashed on it, but it continues to shrink. He can’t see it, as whatever is left your body shrinks out of existence.
1451122.title: Oh merde...

choices: Beach. I will have my revenge!
14512.content:
You hold on for dear life as Barney walks back with Kevin to the couch. Power Rangers are still playing.

“You said we would go to the beach today?” Says Kevin.

“Yea, Gotta watch this real quick, it’s half way over.” Barney sits down.

You get lucky, somehow you stop shrinking. You’re only a 1/64 of an inch though. You look around, compared to the shoe, you’re only the size of a grain salt. You wait, but you don’t think you’re going to shrink any more right now. Maybe you’re done, but you can’t take that chance. You need to climb up to Barney’s ear and tell him that you need help. But at this size it might take a while. You start climbing up. You reach the bottom of his shirt by the time the show is over.

“Ok, let’s go Kev!” Says Barney.

“Yea! To the beach!” Says Kevin. They jump off the couch.

You need to hurry to the ear. Barney walks to his room and grabs his backpack. You get to his collar. He gets on some sun screen. You’re at his neck. He walks out the door! You hop into his ear and scream as loud as you can!

“Wait!”

“Ow, Kevin, what’s up? Something wrong?” Say’s Barney

“I didn’t say anything…” Kevin is waiting by his bike.

“Go back inside, you forgot something!” You say. You can’t let him know that you’re there.

“What did I forget?...”

“Snacks, you left them in the guest room!” you say. ‘Come on, go for it…’ you think to yourself.

He starts walking to the guest room. He spots the peanut butter jar on the floor and the cake on the dresser.

“Put the cake in your right ear!”

Barney does so instinctively, take a piece and sticking it in his ear.

“Ew that’s gross!” he screams out. You take a bite of the cake, as small of an amount as it was, it would do that job. He pulls his finger out of his ear, only to discover you. You are now a half inch tall and still growing.

“Hey!” He says pausing as he grabs you. “Why are you so small…?”

“Let go of me!” You say as he squeezes you.

“You made me stick cake in my ear! Oh… I’m gonna have fun with you.” He smiles.

He brings you out and stuffs you in his back pack, specifically one of the front pockets. You stop growing at a inch and a half. Smaller than a mouse, you can’t get a hold of any of the cake. He puts the cake in a small Tupperware from the kitchen and brings the purple peanut butter along with some bread and water.

“Sorry Kevin! Let’s go have some fun” he snickered to himself.

As he gets on, the zipper is undone slightly. You have a chance to get out. But he has all the cake with him. You would be stuck outside the house, but at least you won’t be with Barney…
14512.title: Captured!

145121.content: The Pack is cramped and hard to move around it, but soon you get outside to the beach. It's a beautiful day out as Kevin and Barney pull up to parking lot on their bikes and chain them. You hang on as Barney and Kevin get into the changing stalls. he sets his bag as they take off their clothes, nows your chance. You might be able to get into the cake, the tupperawere is in the right spot to pry it open with your tiny body. On the other hand, if you get into the peanut butter, you might be able to booby trap the cake tupperwere and get Barney down to a reasonable size. It was a risk, but it was better than going for the cake with him at full size. They were just now getting their trunks on, quick!
145121.title: Beach, What a Horrible Day.

choices: No. I'll take my chances with Kevins mouth.
1451212.content:
You get into the peanut butter jar but slip into it. Somehow you get it in your mouth. You swallow a tiny amount as you try to spit it out. You begin to shrink back to the size of a grain of sand. The jar jerks around as Barney picks up the bag. You are beyond screwed. you look around to see if there's a way out, but none to be seen. You work your way out of the peanut butter and stand up. The vast plain of purple death is everywhere, as you hear the words that you would dread for what remained of your life.

"Hey barney, I didn't really eat anything this morning." Says Kevin.

"I grabbed some PB and J mix from the guest room, here, make yourself a sandwich." Says Barney as he tosses the bag to Kevin.

Kevin smiles as he opens the bag. As sweet as he seems, he would be the person to end your existence. He grabs a slice of bread, and a knife, along with the peanut butter and takes a scoop. He spreads the peanut butter on the bread with you on it. You emerge, this time with a peanut butter free mouth. You look over the edge to see how far it is down. You have the option of jumping... But you might not survive the trip down after that sudden stop. Would you jump?
1451212.title: Get into the peanut butter!

choices: "I didn't shrink him! The peanut butter did!"
"Feed us the Cake! We'll turn back to normal!"
14512121.content:
Kevin opens his mouth wide as cringe. You can see all the way down his throat, a moist cave that does not look inviting at all. It looks like the size of a concert hall. You get ready to jump on one of his teeth and hide under his gums until he’s done. He starts chewing, you leap just in time to miss getting mashed into the peanut butter, although you’re small enough to where you might not even get crushed in between his teeth, you’re worried more so about getting more of the peanut butter in your mouth. You get in between his teeth and wait. You can hear the bone grinding against each other. Though, the tooth seems to be getting smaller. He did eat an entire sandwich, so how small is he going to get?
You jump on his red lips, and start to move down to his shirt. Compared to him, you’re now the size of the tip of his pinky. He doesn’t seem to notice as you slide down his chest and onto his belt. He sneak over to the side, you doubt you would make the drop to the floor. You’re now the size of his thumb as you slip into his front pocket. The pocket gets tighter and tighter, eventually you’re the size of a doll. You poke your head out and see… giant tan globs. You hide back in Kevin’s pocket as your pressed up against his thigh. It’s very soft, but the pressure from whatever it was outside of your little safe place is pressing just a little too hard.

After twenty minutes of this the pressure stops, you couldn’t even hear anything but the violent pulse of something horrible. You poke your head out and see… A doll house…

“Oh god please no.” You say under your breath.

“Who are you?” You get picked up by Kevin, his kind green eyes stare deep into you.

“I’m… well, it doesn’t really matter. You’re friends with Barney right?”

“Yea! My name is Kevin!” He smiled, his teeth glimmered under whatever light was being shone.

A great rumbling sounded as the roof of the doll house was lifted. Barney loomed over the both of you. he reached down and put in a thimble full of kool aid.

“Oh nice, thanks Barney!”

“No problem little guy. Don’t worry, we’ll… figure… something out…” he paused. “Say… what’s that in your hand.”

“Oh, I found a tiny person in my pocket.” Said Kevin. He showed you off like you were his new pet.

“Huh… Here let me take a look.” Barney picked up Kevin with his finger and thumb and brought him to his eye. “… Twerp!” He caught a glimpse of you as you tried to hit your face. “You shrunk him didn’t you!”
14512121.title: From Bad to Worse.

14512122.content:
You run down the slice of bread and jump, spreading your arms out and soaring as you fall down that dangerous five feet drop. You gently float down like a feather to the floor; it’s wet, but at least it smells like the minty soap they were using to wash up. You look up as you see Kevin and Barney in their trunks, ready to go to the beach and enjoy the day. They walk out, and you just realized that you are the size of a grain of sand stuck in a men’s shower room in the middle of summer. You hear Barney and Kevin freaking out as you see Kevin shrink down to two inches tall, but Barney only laughs and picks him up and walks out of the shower room. You perish the thought of helping Kevin and you start running across the tile, but realized after twenty minutes of running you will not be getting out any time soon. But to your horror you realize that you are out in the open, and that there are people moving about.

A large foot nearly crushes you as a boy steps by, dripping wet. One of the drops of water hits you. Trapped in a small puddle the size of someone’s thumb, yet a small lake to you, you try to swim out before you drown. It’s another ten minutes as another boy walks by and passes over you, dripping wet and creating more water for you to traverse.

You realize soon enough that the water is going towards the drain; you get out of the puddle after taking so much of it in your mouth that you feel full of this shower water. Nearly missing the drain that was sure to kill you, what got you was the fifteen year old kid who stepped on you. You had looked up to see him; a tall, or at least seemingly tall, boy with bright eyes and brown hair had crushed you with his foot the size of a city compared to you. You are stuck to his foot, as you slowly lose consciousness. The smell of mint soap used to clean his body and the shower that filled your tiny body was all that you felt before death.
14512122.title: You are dead, not big suprise.

15.author_name: This site is dead.I wana leave

Go somewhere and try to get someone to eat one or the other
Forget the whole idea, and just stick with your cousians

Then agian you cousians are jerks, maybe you should just go out somewhere, maybe even try to get some to eat one the magic items, or use them yourself.
You step outside and think about what to do.
15.title: Lets blow this popstand!

151.content: You go out side with a backpack after calling your Aunt Fiona and making sure you can go out. She thinks it is a lovely idea for you to go make friends. You go to the local park and go in the fun house. No one is here so it's safe to use them. You reach in your bag for the peanut butter and put some on your finger. You stick it in your mouth and feel dizzy. You start to shrink down. You are now almost HALF your original size. You decide to get even smaller and eat some more. You start shrinking again and finally stop. You seem to be 3 inches tall. That is good enough for now so you shove the peanut butter back in your backpack. Then you here something below. You look outside the plastic window of the play place and realize a little boy and his mom just got here. You have to get big again quick! You reach your hand in the bag and your eyes grow wide.
151.title: Try this on for size!

1511.content: The cake isn't there not even a crumb! This is bad news. You close the backpack and put it on your shoulders. The tunnel starts to shake as the boy crawls through the tunnels. You hope he won't notice you because your so small and you get lucky he doesn't. But he does notice the plastic window. He looks out and sees his mom so he sits down to wave to her. When he sits he crushes you. He then notices the lump he is on and moves off of you. He turns around and sees you laying there in a daze. "Cool an action figure" his loud voice booms. He picks you up and puts you in his pocket and continues on. You finally wake up fully and feel yourself being shoved from side to side as the boy walks home with his mom. You here a door open and the little boy runs up to his room. He closes the bed room door and pulls you out. He starts looking at you and then pokes you in your stomach. "OW" you scream. The boy drops you on his bed and looks at you. "Wow...you can talk?" The boy asks. You nod. He picks you up again. "Hi I'm Ben and I'm 5 years old." He puts you down on the bed again and you figure out a way to escape.
1511.title: From bad to Worse!

15111.content: You grab the peanut butter out of your back pack and eat some more. You start to shrink again but get dizzy and slip riding to the floor on Billy's Blanket. You put your backpack under his bed and start to explore the room. You don't see Billy yet so you take a few steps out. Then you hear him. He is on the bed looking where he left you. He gives up and takes off his shoes. You decide to leave the room for now. As you reach the door you hear his mom call for diner. Billy hops off the bed and starts walking towards you. He gets to you and barely misses you. You turn to look and see his small toe. You run and jump on it. You are lifts up with his foot and back down. He finally gets to the dinning room and sit down. You seem to be half an inch tall and decide to use now to climb up higher.You grab on his jeans and start climbing up you hop in his pocket which since your so small he doesn't even notice.
15111.title: Smaller is safer!

choices: Jump off the spoon hoping you survive the fall
Stay on the spoon and hope for the best

You climb out of his pocket to see what they are eating, but all the dishes are too tall and you can't see inside. You decide that you'd better climb up on one of them for a better look. As you climb up the side of one of the bowls, you realize that you cannot hold onto the side of the bowl, and you fall into what seems to be a bowl of soup. HOT! HOT! HOT! You yell as you enter the boiling hot liquid. Just as you fall in Billy's spoon scoops you up as he prepares to take another bite. You....

Climb up the edge and get out!

This is it, you are going to die! Billy slurps you up into his mouth and you ride down into his stomach. For several days you cling to a corn kernal and float through Billy's body. Finally one day you fall into a big pool of water, and realize its a toilet! You....
1511112.title: Stay on the spoon and hope for the best

15111122.content: You decide your last chance for survival is to climb out now. Just before Billy flushes the toilet, you climb out over the edge and fall with a loud thud to the floor. After finally getting back on your feet, you make your way out of the bathroom and start heading for the stairs. When you finally get there you are about to climb up the stairs when you see Billy's pet cat, you....
15111122.title: Climb up the edge and get out!

151111222.content: you stay where you are hoping Billy's cat doesn't see you. unfortunately he does. Billy's cat scoops you into his mouth. you lay face down on his tongue as he savors your taste. eventually, he swallows you whole. as you travel down his esophagus, you can't believe you've been eaten two times now. you land in the stomach with small splash. the stomach acids imedeatly start to work digesting you. meanwhile, Billy's cat goes to Billy's room to take a nap while you're slowly being digested. As he falls asleep, he can't help but think about how much you tasted like catnip.
151111222.title: you're catnip

In a few moments you discover to your horror that_______
151112.title: What happens Next

1511121.content:
Suddenly you remembered you needed to locate the cake lest disaster strikes.
You look around from your position.

In a few moments you discover to your horror that the 5 year old boy had discovered the cake.

"Mm cake" cake you hear him say as he starts stuffing his face.
You hop out his pocket and manage to catch enough crumbs to return to normal size.


"Hey where you come from" he said as he finished off the last bite.

You were too late.
Suddenly the boy grabbed his stomach

"I feel weird" he said.

Suddenly you notice him start to grow.


How big will he get for now
1511121.title: The boy discovered the cake

1511122.content:
Suddenly you remembered you needed to locate the cake lest disaster strikes.
You look around from your position.

In a few moments you discover to your horror that you can't yet see it.
You do notice and overhear a little girl being picked on by 3 boys.

"Give it back Tim" she says.

"Haha no way little Lizzie's lunch is now ours" taunt the bigger boys.

You can't do much for her and your ride is walking away.
You hop out of the pocket and make your way to them as the girl is pushed down.


"Ha ha Little Lizzie is a cry baby" they taunt as they leave.

Lizzie begins to sniffle
"It's no fair big broffer and his fwieinds aweeze booey me"


As you approach Lizzie you take note of her features
She's wearing white shocks,
No shoes presumably stolen by her tormentors
A blue mini skirt
Pink panties and a white shirt with the words Daddy's best little girl


Her hair was auburn
You couldn't see her eyes.
Based on her speech and appearance you surmise she must be between 3 and 4 1/2 at most
You also observed she seemed small for her age even from your shrunken perspective.


As you thought you had no reason to stay her tummy growled.
She stopped crying.

"I'm hungwy but them meanies didn't get the cake I found"

You stopped walking away as she pulled the missing cake from her skirt pocket.

A few crumbs fell on the ground.

You dashed for them as Lizzie began eating the cake.


You get a few then hide behind the nearest bench as you eat and return to normal size.

Rushing back to Lizzie you yell "stop kid don't eat that"

It was too late she'd consumed the entire thing.


"What's wrong mister? Was dis your cake? I swear I jus found it honwest"

You stare in horror white as a ghost.

"I'm sowwy but my big bwoffer and his meanie fwiends stwole my wunch...

Lizzie stopped midway through her explanation and defense and put her hand on her tummy

"H-hey mister I f-feel weird"
Suddenly "little" Lizzie began to grow.
1511122.title: Another kid discovered the cake

1511123.content:
Suddenly you remembered you needed to locate the cake lest disaster strikes.
You look around from your position.

In a few moments you discover to your horror that the boy who's pocket you were in was walking away.
Worse still you spot the bench you'd taken a break at earlier, on it was the cake.

As you hop out of the pocket a mother parks a stroller next to the bench oblivious to what was on it.


The mother then gets a phone call.
You race to the bench as the baby notices the cake.
You get to the stroller but how to get the cake?

It's too late the toddler has the cake.

"Ummy oookie" says the girl as she smushed bits of cake into her mouth.


Lucky for you she drops some crumbs.
You grab them then rush under the bench.
You managed to return to normal.


Crawling out from the bench you approached the mother daughter duo.


The toddler had just finished the cake.

"Miss your daughter you gotta get away from her" you say


The mother looks at you like you're nuts

"What are you taking about? Are you trying to kidnap my girl"

"No listen it isn't safe"


"Go away or...." you're both cut off by giggling and some creaking noise.

Suddenly you both notice what you feared.

"M-my baby girl what have you done to my little girl"
Shrieks the mother.


The toddler was not only growing but clearly outgrowing her clothes, and her stroller.
Oddly her pink diaper was the only thing growing with her.
1511123.title: A Baby has the cake.

choices: Uh-Oh the Cake was swiped by a 5 year old girl soon to be not so little girl

152.content:
You decided to Go somewhere and try to get someone to eat one or the other.

Taking the cake and Peanut Butter concoction with you you walk down the street. After a few blocks you decided to rest. Noticing you're outside a seemingly empty park you set the items down on a bench and head to the public drinking fountain.


Meanwhile you're foolishly unaware that someone swiped one of the items and would be long gone before you got back.

Tremor? The tallest new neighbor outside your bedroom window!
1521.content:
While you were away a cute but very short for her age little girl happened upon your stuff.

This girl was a 4 1/2 year old blonde with green eyes , cream colored skin and her hair in pig tails.
She was wearing a white shirt with red sparkles and glitter and pink lettered writing that read
"Mommy and Daddy's little angel"

She also wore a blue mini skirt, white socks, and pink shoes

This girls name was Tina



Tina ignored the bag she saw and instead grabbed a small slice of cake and the jar of peanut butter.
Her family was unaware she had slipped away during their outing.


Tina then found the secluded jungle gym. There she tried some cake but it was dry and bland. She got the idea to try the peanut butter but in the process of opening it spilled some on her skirt. Oddly as she wiped it some seeped through to her pink panties.


Tina then put some on the cake and ate some more.
Alas it didn't help much but man was the peanut butter delicious.
She soon set to work chowing down on the peanut butter.


A short time later she had managed to eat the entire jar of purple peanut butter.
She felt strange a bit but quickly shrugged it off as her big sister Age 14 and on tall side with blue eyes found her.


"There you are Tina. Mom and dad have been worried sick and on top of that you changed your shirt to one of the top small ones that we were going to donate today" said the elder sister noticing some of Tina's belly was visible and the shirt a tad small.


"Anyway c'mon let's get you back to the car"
With that she picked Tina up

"Huh you feel a bit heavier than I last recall! Oh well it's been awhile since I've carried you"


Later...
1521.title: Uh-Oh the ____was swiped by a 5 year old girl ...

choices: Later bullying interrupted! A change in the works
Becky bullying her little sis..uh oh this won't end well
1523.content:
The local fat bully 15 year old was a 7'7 brick shit house of a menace.
Her given name was Rebecca Ryan's sometimes called Becca.
She preferred Becky.


Becky was somewhat of a trouble maker to put things mildly and nicely.
She was naturally an auburn haired girl but in her rebellious streak had turned it purple.
She was a mix of punk, goth and bad girl.


Some of Becky's past times including low key shoplifting or pickpocketing, bullying kids and taking their lunches, lunch money, allowance and valuables and a few other odds and end generally bad stuff.


Becky happened upon some snacks and an abandoned bag.

"Ha too EZ the moron won't know what hit them! FREE eats, an iPod, and a transit pass! Good haul today"


Sometime later Becky had finished the snacks.
1523.title: The Peanut Butter was pilfered by the neighborh...

choices: Becky begins to shrink while bullying her sis
Little Sis and the Peanut Butter! Uh Oh NOT So little sis! PB Makes you BIG!
15233.content:
After Becky finished most of the snacks she went home.
There she was going to enjoy some "peaceful sisterly torture" of her 5 year old sister


Things at home would soon take a turn though
15233.title: Becky bullying her little sis..uh oh this won...

154.content:
You stayed outside for a few more minutes, debating your options. Finally, you decided to go back inside and keep an eye on your cousins. It was the right thing to do, after all. Even though you couldn't stand to be around them for too long.

You enter the house and expect to see your cousins still watching TV, but are surprised when the entire downstairs area is completely empty. The TV was still blaring, though. "That was nice of them," you say, turning the TV off.

You hear laughing coming from upstairs. "They'd better not be messing with my stuff,"you think to yourself, as you walk upstairs to investigate.

First, you check your Aunt and Uncle's bedroom. Dora was notorious for sneaking into her parent's room and trying on her mother's make-up. You open the door. No one there.

Still, the laughing continues. You walk down the hallway, towards the sound of the laughter. You stop at your bedroom door. You put your ear up to the door and hear the sound of saran wrap being pulled. They found the cake!

You burst in the room, just in time to see who eat the cake?
154.title: The Right Thing To Do

choices: Barney has a small growth spurt
Barney has a large growth spurt
1541.content:
You throw the door open, and standing there by your bed is Barney. Thankfully his hands are empty at the moment, but you notice the cake is not where you left it. It is sitting much closer to the end of the bed, right next to where Barney is standing... and the plastic wrap on it has been opened.

Barney stares at you with a cold mischief in his eyes. "Hiya runt, did you think I wasn't gonna find out you were holding out on me?" he asks, looking at the cake and then back at you. "This looks delicious, and I know you're gonna wanna share it with your cousin... right?"

You open your mouth to respond, but he already has cake in hand as he shoves you out of the way. "Thanks runt" he yells from down the hall. You have a mini-panic attack! You can't let him eat any of that cake but you know you can't take it by force. Maybe you can rush by him and grab the cake before he has a chance to do anything! Then you make a break for the door and don't stop running until you hit state lines! ...Ok, ok, that might be a bit dramatic but you have to act now before he has a chance to have even a little bit.

You rush down the stairs and, surprisingly, there's the cake sitting on the coffee table... but the plastic is off! You slowly walk over, expecting Barney to come out of nowhere and tackle you or something, but he is nowhere to be found. After determining the situation safe, you grab up the plate of cake and start to sprint towards the door when Barney comes around the corner chugging a glass of milk. Terror roots you in place, unable to move.

Once finished with his milk, Barney notices you and laughs "if you want it that badly, you can have it runt."

He drops to the couch and props his feet up on the coffee table. You are stupified, and cannot imagine what happened. Noticing your confused look, Barney pipes up "that is probably the WORST cake I've ever tasted, thankfully I only had a little bite or I might have been sick."

These words knock you out of your stupor and launch you into a full blown panic attack! You quickly take the cake into the kitchen and stash it under the sink, behind some bottles and rush back into the living room. Before you can even think about going for the peanut butter to try to fix this, Barney burps...
1541.title: Barney

1543.content:
Hearing the sounds of plastic wrap and that chuckling voice, you twist the doorknob. Finding it's stuck! You rattle the doorknob and finally it twists open. Flinging open the guest bedroom, you shout. "Hey!" and rush to the window where you kept your open suitcase. Atop the open suitcase on top of your clothes is a note.

Picking up the note, you read it. Hand written in fancy, curly loops like one of those letters seen on PBS, the message reads:

Johnny Dear! I'm glad you're back this Summer. Barney and Dora are certainly happy
you're back!


Snorting to yourself, you mutter, "Yeah right. Like a case of the mumps." Then read on.

Last Summer, do you remember that refrigerator we tossed out? I think you may have
found a few things in it like a jar and a tiny box with cake in it. Be a good dear and tell
me if you did. They belong to a colleague of mine at the University...

How did your Aunt know? Did she put the note here? Glancing down, you notice the cake has been moved from it's hiding place in your luggage and lies atop your clothes, along with the Jar of peanut butter! You glance down at the note.

By the way, you're not the only guest here. He's staying with us while my colleague is out
of town. Say hi to Max.

Love Aunt Fiona.

Suddenly, you hear a snort and turn towards your guest bed. The bed is occupied by someone...
1543.title: Another guest

15431.content:
Reclining atop your bed is a very large dog. Tan and black with long silky fur and tall wolf like ears. Taken aback, you back away a step or two from the German Shepherd. The dog casually wags his tails, panting casually. Appearing quite friendly.

"Ah hi." You say as you cautiously approach and reach out with the back of your hand as it's snuffled over. You rub the dogs cheek. The shepherd gruffs happily. Tail thumping against the covers. His red collar has a large brass name tag. MAX

You say, "Hi Max." And are rewarded with the dog's tongue slurping your hand and bumping his nose against it. "At least you're friendly."

Suddenly the dog's ears poink upwards. He gruffs. Outside your door, you hear feet pounding up the stairs. Thinking quickly, you move back to your suitcase and close the cloth lid atop it. Just in time too.

Dora sticks her head into your room. "Hey Bug!" It's the nickname she gave you last summer.

"What is is Dora?"

"I see you met Max. He belongs to one of Mom's weird university friends. We're dog sitting him for the week. And guess what?"

"What?"

"He's got to stay in your room cause Barney's got an Albergie to dog fur!"

"That's Allergy Dora.."

"What ever Bug. He has to stay here or in the backyard. And since we don't have a dog house outside, he's going to be in *your* room at night!"

"What?"

"Don't worry, I told Mom you'd be glad to take care of him! Bye now! He's your responsibility."

The little brat turns and runs off, leaving you and Max alone. You quietly shut the door. Max sighs an almost Human sigh. You approach the bed sitting down on the edge next to the dog, rubbing his ears.

"I know how you feel Max. We're both stuck here like inmates in the dog pound."

Well, thinking to yourself, at least Barney will be keeping his distance. While rubbing Max's ears, you puzzle over this morning's events. That voice..where did it come from? No one else, but Max was in the room. And who left that note on the suitcase? Barney? Dora said he was allergic to dogs. And had Dora had left the note, she would have taken the jar and wrapped up cake.

You stand up from the bed, walk to the bedroom door, close it and return to the suitcase. Curious now and thinking of trying an experiment...
15431.title: Meet Max

154311.content:
Opening your suitcase lid, you study the misplaced, wrapped cake. It *had* been moved from it's hiding place, but the plastic appears undisturbed. However, the top lid of the peanut butter jar is loose. Twisting it open, you notice a furrow in the purple buttery stuff. About the size of a finger. Did someone take a finger-full?

Holding the jar, you stand up and glance outside your bedroom window. In the backyard, cousin Barney is tossing rocks at a tree in the next yard. Doing what he does best. Being a vandal. You take a step to the door and open it slightly. You can hear the TV blaring downstairs and what sounds like Dora singing along. She's occupied as well.

You take a step back and almost yelp when you feel something cold press against your backside. It's Max's nose. The German Shepherd is now standing atop the bed, head tilted, tail wagging. The dog belches loudly. Grinning a most un-dog like grin.

Feeling flustered, you turn and reach down into the suitcase taking out a folded day pack. Flopping it open, you place the cake inside it with one hand. Holding the peanut butter jar, you start to wonder. Is it still potent? Glancing at Max, you open the jar and take a small finger-full of purple peanut butter and hold it out to Max. "Here Max, try some of this."

Max hesitates, glancing up at you. And again grins that unnerving toothy grin. Ears perked, the dog extends his long muzzle towards your finger. He licks off the peanut butter with a huge tongue. You take a breath, expecting the dog to shrink. A minute passes. Nothing. Another minute. Nothing still. Max is still the same size canine.

"Well, maybe the peanut butter doesn't work anymore."

Opening the jar lid, you gather up a big glop of purple peanut butter in your finger and lick it down. It tastes the same. You hesitate, waiting for that tingle you felt last summer that signaled the start of shrinking. Again, nothing!

"Well Max, I think we can say the peanut butter doesn't work at all."

Max snorts in reply. You swear it almost sounds like a laughing gruff.

"I think I'd better go to the University to see Aunt Fiona. Since she knows I have the jar and cake."

Shrugging your shoulders, you screw on the lid and place the peanut butter jar into your day-pack with the wrapped up cake. Slithering the pack around your arms and shoulders, you see Max staring intently at you as you open the bedroom door.

Suddenly Max jumps off the bed and slithers between your legs and open door. Blocking your exit. The dog rears up, pressing his forepaws against your chest. The unexpected motion causing you to lose your balance and falling backwards against the Bed.

"Max!" Lying atop the bed, day-pack underneath. You roll upright and suddenly feel a tingling running all over your skin. The same feeling you had when the peanut butter shrank you! Your clothes start to feel loose as the room appears to grow around you!
154311.title: An experiment

1543111.content:
Any thoughts about the delayed reaction of the purple peanut butter are swept aside as the straps of your growing day pack pull you back onto your bed. The pack underneath your body becoming larger and heavier. Feet pulling upwards as your socks and shoes slip off. Oddly your shirt and shorts seem to stay with you in size as you fall backwards in a tangle of day-pack straps becoming slabs of giant flat ropes.

The sensation of tingling ceases. Leaving your to squirm around atop a field of heaved, black weave and straps curved like arches atop a landscape of bed. The ceiling and bedroom window looms off in the distance. Trying to get your wits about, you crawl over a mattress sized tag. The day-pack maker's tag a bit bigger than you.

You exhale, "That purple stuff did shrink me." This time you're bigger than a bug, but somewhat smaller than a mouse. At least most of your clothes shrank with you.

A massive tan and black shape erupts overhead and lands atop the bed. The day-pack you're on bounces upwards. Hanging on to the strap keeps you from being thrown off the bed. A gargantuan Max, muzzle looming above, parts cavernous jaws open as yard long fangs grip a day-pack strap. Max shakes the day-back, causing you to tumble off the day-back and onto frozen waves of bedding. The vast dog turns around. You roll sideways, avoiding a car sized hind paw impacting the bedding a mere shrunken foot away. The vast shape leaps off, carrying away your day-pack. Along with your peanut butter and the chocolate cake antidote!

Fearing the dog will bolt out of the room, you shout out. "Max!"

The dog's vast head periscopes above the edge of the bedding. Jaws gripping the day-pack.

To this day, you don't understand why you shouted out. "You dumb mutt! Don't leave me here!"

Head cocked, understanding running through the dog's eyes. A rumbling noise sounding like a laugh echos above you as the dog opens his jaws, dropping the day-pack on the floor. A vast, perspectively warped muzzle zooms towards you. Bristle lips parting exposing fangs framing a vast waterfall of pink zipping out like a front end loader.

The giant tongue slaps against you, drowning out your shouts.

***


Max's tongue scoops up the tiny figure on the bed. Jaws close. The German shepherd tilts his head upwards. Max lowers his muzzle to the floor, empty jaws snag the day-pack. The large dog trots out the door. Toe nails clitter clattering down the stair treads. The blaring TV masks the noise of canine paws pushing open a screen door and a dark furred shape darting outside.
1543111.title: Pickup

15431111.content:
Maybe it was the darkness, or the glorching sounds all around you that kept you from screaming. Or that weird sensation of sliding down the slimiest of water slides and landing breathless within a damp humid sauna of pillow bumps. Pitch black, bouncing all around. Swaying madly. Gasping for breath in the dank. It dawns on you where you are. Inside the belly of dog.

The chamber sways as you shout. "Heeeeelp!!!"

The internal noises of dog lungs and belly gurgles answer back.

Along with another voice. "Oye! Be quiet! We're heading back to the lab!"

You slap yourself, thinking you're hallucinating.

"Hold on, I'll put on a light."

A bluish orb glows from what looks like a conical flashlight. Illuminating the ridged gloom of moist, rippled walls inside Max's stomach. The whole affair swaying to and fro in tune to vast dog legs no doubt trotting briskly outside. The light attached to the tip of a sagging glowing pointy hat belonging to a soaked, gnome like being your own size. Dressed in dark clothing, badly slimed and wearing what appears to be a long thin beard.

The gnome, or what looks like one looks in your direction. "Relax! The peanut butter you et will keep you from becoming a snack for Max."

"Eerg! Who are you!?" A jolt pitches you against the side of the belly wall as the gnome grumbles loudly. More to himself than answering you.

"Deliver a message Harlo, she sez. Sneak it in his suitcase. Max will keep an eye out fo ya. Damn mutt slept while you ran up the stairs."

You stammer, "What do you mean?"

Suddenly the belly 'room' pitches upwards in a massive jolt, everything seems to free fall all around as Max has taken a huge leap. You're pitched up against the gnome as the two of you tumble into a heap.

"You had to came home early!" The gnome shouts. "I snarfed down a chunk o peanut butter to shrink and hide from you. Got atop the bed just as you started to pound on the door. Course I had to pull Max's ear and open my big trap 'Hide me Max. Hide me!' "

Suddenly the 'room' brakes, causing you and the gnome to slide into one slimy side. The belly tilts as all seems to have gone still. Except for the frantic bellows noise of vast canine lungs panting.

The gnome with the glowing hat tip pushes you off of him. "And Max takes me literally. He shore taint the brightest Fammy that Eleanor has got. But he had enough smarts to take that pack of yours."

All of this. Being shrunk, riding inside the stomach of a dog, and having a grumpy gnome grousing at you is just too surreal.

"Can you tell me what's going on?" You call out amidst the swaying.

The gnome gruffs, "It's all about the peanut butter and cake you stole last Summer!"

The room sways again in a slow back and forth motion. Then becomes still. The gnome grumps, "Feels like Max is where he wants to be. This is where we get off."

Hat tip still glowing like a flashlight, his soaked gnarled face glares at you. No doubt you're looking just as slimed and messy looking. He reaches out a gnarled clawed hand, gripping yours. You pull your hand back.

"Hang on." The gnome gruffs, "Are ya gonna stay here?" You sputter as the gnome laughs. "And wait for Max to let you out the slow way? Through the back door? I think not. Now take me hand."

You let the Gnome's hand grip yours. The bluish light from his cap seems to erupt around you in a blinding flash.
15431111.title: A voice darkly

choices: He does something else with the knife.
154311111.content:
Eye's blinded by that blue flash, the fleshy floor way underneath vanishes! Causing you to tumble and fall seemingly a few feet to a hard surface, bouncing a bit. Gasping for breath in fresh air and bright light this time, not the foul dank of a canine stomach. Slowly hauling yourself upright, you catch a glimpse of a furry ceiling overhead. A set of giant furry limbs, two in front and two in back like columns surround you. A hard plain of linoleum beneath you.

Nearby you hear that voice. "That dog could have least had the courtesy to recline when I teleported us out of there! Hate falling, I do!"

The voice belongs to that Gnome, the best thing you can call him, as he's standing next to you, busy wiping the drool and slime off his clothes. He lifts his head upwards.

"Max!" Move yer big bod!"

The massive shape overhead shifts away. A hind paw slaps down a few feet away.

"Watch yer paws ya big furball!" The gnome shouts. The giant dog complies and steps away carefully this time. Seating his gargantuan, silky furred bulk nearby, watching the two of you. Next to the dog is a pile of black and straps. Your day-pack!

You tremble, realizing that a few moments ago you were inside that massive beast's belly. Glancing around reveals towering columns of metal rising above the floor. Some merge to a several plateaus high above...desks. A wheeled platform soars overhead nearby. An office chair as seen by someone tinier than mouse. More similar structures can be seen in the distance. Metal chair legs and the like. Other than Max, no one else, or at least their feet, can be seen.

"Where are we?" You stutter. Taking a breath, you calmly ask again. "I mean, it...it looks like a classroom."

"It is. North Annex. Room 5" The Gnome replies. "It's Eleanor O'Gelly's Language Lab. She teaches when she ain't making spells and stuff. Though the college stuff isn't my business."

Perplexed you stare at the gnome. He shrugs putting out a gnarly hand, "I'm Harlo, former garden gnome. Messenger for the Iletium Witches." He slaps himself. "Oooo, I shouldn't have said that."

"What do you mean Iletium?" You reply as you shake Harlo's hand.

"I'll explain later. First things first. Let's get some stuff out of your day-pack." Harlo hikes over to the hillock of day-pack, wriggling his way through a partly opened flap leading to the cavernous interior.

He continues to chatter, voice sounding muffled. "Hey! I forgot to ask your name! Even though I already know it."

"My name is Johnny." You reply to the day-pack flap entryway.

"Pleased to meet ya Johnny. Though I'd prefer in different circumstances." The muffled voice becomes clearer as Harlo emerges, one hand holding a huge, crumbly spongey piece of chocolate cake. The cake piece is comically enlarged as Harlo is just as small as you. The other hand is yanking on what looks like a tattered blanket of white. A Kleenex no doubt left in the bottom of your day-pack.

Harlo's gnarly hand drops the Kleenix 'blanket'. Out of a side, leathery leg pocket, he pulls out a wicked looking knife!
154311111.title: Fresh room air

1543111112.content:
Harlo's knife slices through the Kleenix, he tears off a yard wide square of it and tosses it towards you. The fuzzy white napkin piling around your feet.

"Use that to wipe yourself down. Don't think you'd like to swimming in dog belly slime for the rest of yer days."

Harlo slices another length of Kleenix and begins to towel himself down. Singing a ditty. "Never a bath I'll take! Give me rainwater, a birdbath and a garden to sleep..!"

Following Harlo's lead, you do the same, wiping your face, neck and clothes. Paying attention to clean off your shirt and summer shorts as best as possible. Grimacing at the yellowy, smelly stuff being swept up by the Kleenix. While wiping your bare legs, you notice that you have no socks or shoes. They didn't shrink with you!

"Oh no! My shoes!"

"You likely left them at the House. Come away from the table leg." Harlo calls out. He then looks up at the towering seated dog nearby. "Max, stay where yer are. We're going to be elevating up in minute."

Harlo hikes away to a clear spot in the class room, the row between desks. He motions for you to follow. The gnome holds out a piece of chocolate cake. You take the over sized crumb.

"Don't eat it yet. Give me some room too!" Harlo moves several shrunken yards away from you. "Snack away!"

The pair munch down on the cake. Almost at once, you feel that ticklish sensation, just like last Summer. Wobbling as you can feel the ground shift underneath the soles of your feet, the table legs start to descend. Everything is falling down around you as you grow!

Finally, having grown back to your old size, all seems normal. Except for standing in an empty classroom, who knows how far away from your Aunt's house. With clothes still damp and smelling lightly of dog vomit and being barefoot as well. The ceiling lights are unlit. The nearby room door is shut. The latch turned to the lock position. By the teacher's desk is a large window. Both side windows are open, letting a breeze in. Beyond the window is a view of a short bit of tall grass with some brush and trees in the back.

Puzzled, you ask. "How did we get in here?"

"Eleanor usually leaves the window open during the summer. Max jumped through it while he carried us and the backpack. Pretty smart for a familiar isn't he?"

"A what?"

"Most of Eleanor's circle keep cats, but she's allergic to cat fur. So she picked out a dog to be her familiar."

Suddenly, you feel a cold nose brushing your leg. It's Max, normal in size. The large silky furred German shepherd looks up at you, tail wagging as he wuffs. You get the idea that Max sounds apologetic. Despite the ordeal of traveling here, you find yourself petting the dog.

"It's okay Max. I'm not mad at you for swallowing me."

Max's tail wags, kicking up a fair sized breeze.

"Max tells me you're a fine lad too," said Harlo as he strides towards your day-pack. He picks it up, rummaging through it. "I guess we can trust you to help us after all. Ah, the jar is safe and sound."

He mutters more to himself. "I wish Eleanor would hurry up and get here. "

"Harlo. What's this all about?"

"Hmm. Long story short. Eleanor's a witch. She and others cooked up this purple peanut butter to condense magic. The shrinking effect and cake is just a side show. But a few witches got jealous about her work. So she hid it for safe keeping last Summer. She gave it to your Aunt with a story about it being a rare sample jar that needed to be stored away in a cool spot. Of course your Uncle, the unknowing daft bugger, tossed out the refrigerator and you found the peanut butter and cake in it."

"But who printed the note I found in my suitcase? It's not my Aunt's handwriting."

Harlo opens his mouth, "Well..."

Harlo paused as Max started to growl, the long haired German shepherd's ears swiveled in the direction of the Classroom door. The dog glances back at Harlo, muttering a series of gruffs and huffs to the gnome.

"Geeze!" said Harlo, "He's coming down the hallway!"

Harlo runs over to you, shoving the day-pack into your hands. "Take this!" He points to the open classroom window. "Jump out there and hide underneath!"

Shoved by Harlo, you're almost thrown out the open window, along with the day-pack. Fortunately, the drop is a yard or so. You land roughly against the ground, grabbing your day-pack and hugging the building siding underneath the window.

The gnome's head glances out the window, looking down at you.

"Johnny!" Harlo hisses, "Stay there. Keep quiet and don't move till I tell you!"

You hug the side of the building, crouched, bare feet against the rough grass. quietly listening to the metallic sound of a door bolt opening inside the classroom.
1543111112.title: Classroom chat

15431111121.content:
You start to listen in, but then Harlo runs to you and crams some of the peanut butter in your mouth and then his.

Instantly the two of you shrink, so much that you find yourself looking up at grass towering overhead, before you could ask why, Harlo hauled you over to the edge of the grass onto a wooden curb that lined the area, which of course was a playground. Hearing a thunderous roar you turned to look at the doors onto the playground and saw a class of titanous kindergarteners come out to play.

The 'little' kids were massive forces of nature, towering 20,000ft tall compared to you, though of course for the moment this was the smallest you'd ever been, probably something Harlo had done. Likely to avoid the kids who'd no doubt question your being there.

Just as you were about to ask what was up, four of the monstrous boys came running over in a game of tag, each step creating an earthquake. You couldn't see much besides there feet, the one in the lead was in skating shoes, the next was in sandals, and after that barefoot, the kid who was apparently 'it' trailed behind in blue flip-flops.

He stopped right in front of you and Harlo, beads of sweat the size of lakes splashing down all around, the titan slipped his feet out and sat them down right in front of you, 714ft tall...

Next....
15431111121.title: You listen in.

154311111211.content:
The boy's toes loomed over you, a wall of flesh just a hundred ft. away or an 8th of an inch to the giants, if he moved the smallest distance you'd be crushed!

Then, the heel of the massive foot lifted up as the rest of the giant came down, he was crouching low about to bolt off after one of his unsuspecting friends. The giant's hand came down next to you, and a bracelet slipped down right behind you, pinning your tiny little foot in a crack in the wood.

Try as you might, the bracelet weighted tons, nothing on your scale was gonna move it, at least not any time soon. Meanwhile the giant moved his arm a bit and the whole bracelet moved, but still did you no good, then you saw the titan toes move closer as the kid adjusted his weight.

Not only were you trapped by the bracelet, but also crushed by some 'little' kid's tiny toes, it was amazing how much things changed with size.

Then the kid's hand suddenly moved and the sky overhead was blocked out by some weird, tube covered object, a massive protrusion from it struck into the foot and it was jerked back and away from you. The enormous object moved and came down in front of you, it was Max's paw!

You looked up at his 900ft long strands of fur, and at the dog's toes, 1500ft tall, at least last time you were bigger than them. The dog dug its paw into a near by mass of mad, ultra-sticky and moved his paw all over the board on which you stood, It neared, trapping you and Harlo between his toes and walking off, covering miles fractions of minutes, of course he had miles long strides.

While he walked you examined your new enviroment, a landscape of massive boulders, fur bridges, and mud, which you were covered in anyway, what next?
154311111211.title: Rescue?

154311111212.content:
The gargantuan titan in front of you dropped down to a crouch, leaning forward on his toes you saw his heel tower over-head, had you been normal sized it'd be a few inches, on this size it was tons of shear power capable of crushing or hurling you with the most minute force.

Without warning, you saw the titan foot start to lift up and away from you, then things turned for the worse, he was just shifting his weight and put his foot down right in front of you (this is his LEFT FOOT). You gazed up at the gigantic gap between his two biggest toes, filled with dirt and grime, even a 'pebble' more like a skyscraper.

Apparently the giant was impatient, probably waiting on one of his friends to slip up, as he started to wiggle his toes, all you saw though was them rising hundreds of ft up, then slam down, sending a massive cloud of dirt and earthquake through the wood under you.

And open your eyes to be on/in....
154311111212.title: Fun w/ kids...

1543111112121.content:
You opened your eyes and found that there was nothing to see, just absolute black, though in the one direction, you saw what may be the light at the end of this tunnel, far away and above.

All of a sudden you felt something smack your face, for a moment you closed your eyes, wondering what it was and opened them to have night-vision, seeing everything in green's and whites. Harlo stood directly in front of you, each of you being on the edge of some gargantuan, polished surface. Overhead you saw some strange weaved thing, near that light it was totally white, but in the other direction in continued and came down, remaining a dark shade.

Suddenly, everything behind the gloss area and towards the light angled up ward, where the heck were you?

Then, you heard a loud, thunderous "Ready, set..." and then a whistle sounded, the world turned upside down, you were thrown over the side of the shiny object with the force, in the air you saw four more yet, getting 'smaller' as they went before you fell between this one and the next.

Eventually you landed on what appeared to be a rock mountain, examining it, you found that was just about what it was, all rock, all around between the two towering objects to either side. Somehow you managed to avoid being thrown around so much down here, it was totally weird.

Then, you heard a torrential flood over-head and looked up to see liquid pouring down from all over, even the very walls! Finally it hit you, this was SWEAT, and loads of it, you were trapped on some kid's titanous toes, in gym class....
1543111112121.title: Total Darkness

15431111122.content:
Huddled below the window, a loud click, like a door unlatching, can be heard. That's it you think to yourself. The peanut butter, the shrinking. Traveling inside Max and huddled next to a classroom annex building has been too much to handle. Spooked, you grip your daypack and slouch off as if to run away.

Suddenly, you get the sensation of something invisible gripping your neck. Something like four points latching on your neck. Not painfull, but firm enough to be felt. And the strangest sensation of all...as if being a puppet on strings, your body decides to move on it's own accord. Crouching back down where to you where before!

As if to make things even stranger, you hear something, almost like a voice inside your head, a gruffing growling voice telling you to stay where you are and not move!

The feeling of being gripped goes away. Leaving you huddled by building siding, underneath the classroom window. Above, the sounds of two voices talking to one another drift downwards. One of them is Harlo's. The other is a voice dripping with menace. Above you hear the conversation going.


"What's that familiar doing? His eyes are glowing."

"Max? He's had eye glow since he became a familiar."

"Harlo! Don't play me for a fool! I know magic when I see it. Tell that damn dog to stop it or I'll turn him into pile of ashes."

"Max, do what Mr Elberg sez. And don't growl at him Max. You know what a Warlock can do to you. Thank you Max. Now...about your request."

"Harlo, this is not a request. I want that jar."

"Mr. Elberg, I don't have it on me at this moment."

"Yes, I can tell you're not lying. Where is it?"

"It's in a safe place. I can have it delivered to you. Allow me to write a message down for Eleanor."

"Do so and you better not be stalling. I have a mind to turn you into a lawn sculpture."

"Hold your hell horses, I can't write too well under stress....there done writing. I'll roll it up and give to Eleanor and be on my way."

"No Harlo. Let Max deliver that message to Eleanor. You'll be coming with me."

"What?"

"As my guest. Let's say to ensure good will on Eleanor's part that she won't leave the area with that jar."

"Hostage you mean."

"If you care to call it that."

"Fine. Max here's the message. Be a good dog and deliver it."

"Now let's be off!"

Above, you hear what sounds like a loud sizzling noise. Followed by a bang!

Almost yelping, you lie on the ground and suddenly a huge shape flies out the window and lands on the ground next to you!
15431111122.title: The conversation

15431112.content: you slide down max's esoupogous all the why down to his stomach. you land in his stomach with a splash. the stomach acid burns your skin as you are slowly digested. A few days later you wind up in the park as a small pile of dung.
15431112.title: A dog's lunch

info.brief_description: Based off the first macrophile story I ever read. Add please.
info.description:
This is based around the story of Give Yourself Goosebumps #6, Beware the Purple Peanut Butter by R. L. Stine. Rules are simple

1) No dirty stuff, you are supposed to be thirteen so nothing too bad. You can be descriptive during a death scene, but try to keep away from sexual stuff

2) There is no minimum chapter length, so write as much or as little as you feel like.

3) However you have to make sense. If I can't understand what you said then I will delete it.

4) Grammar, spelling and other errors will be frowned upon but ignored for the most part since I make a lot of them myself. For the spelling I make the suggestion that you type your chapter in a word processor first, then copy and paste it onto the chapter form. I use Corel Wordperfect 8 myself

5) No bugs. I find them creepy and crawly myself. The water beetles are only included in the first chapter because they were in the book.
info.pretty_title: Revenge of the Purple Peanut Butter
